text: Ignition experiments at NIF are being performed at a variety of target scales . Smaller targets require less NN and can be fielded more frequently . Successful small target designs can be scaled up to take advantage of DT full NIF laser NN and power . In this talk , PRP will consider a rigorous framework for scaling from smaller to larger targets . DT framework uses both simulation and experimental results to build a statistical prediction of target performance as scale is increased . Our emphasis is on quantifying uncertainty in scaling predictions with DT goal of identifying DT dominant contributors to DT uncertainty . PRP take as a particular example DT Big Foot platform WDT produces a round , 0.8 scale implosion with DT potential to scale to full NIF size ( 1.0 scale ) . text: Imagine a hulking , growling , 8 - foot - tall woodland creature so elusive IN professional trackers can’t find PRP , NNS can only speculate about PRP and believers can’t prove -- definitively -- IN PRP exists . Hiding deep in DT forest MD be your modus operandi , Bigfoot , but Hollywood and Madison Avenue are pushing PRP -- however reluctantly -- into DT spotlight . A slew of documentary , TV and film projects including Animal NNP ’s current hit “ Finding Bigfoot , ” and a Sasquatch film trilogy from “ Blair Witch Project ” director Eduardo Sanchez are poised to VB past DT old grainy images of yesterday and give DT hairy 800 - pound biped a high - def close - up . “ EX ’s been a real upswing in scholarly interest along with this huge undercurrent of popularity among DT general NN , ” VBD Jeffrey Meldrum , DT Idaho NNP anatomy and anthropology professor and primates expert who wrote “ Sasquatch : Legend Meets NNP ” as a companion to a Discovery Channel special of DT same name . “ EX ’s something about DT human psyche WDT really connects with this icon . ” Campfire stories , eyewitness reports and grainy videos have kept DT legend alive for decades in DT U.S. and worldwide . ( DT mythology goes back much further if PRP take cave drawings into account . ) And Bigfoot has been a pop culture fixture since DT 1950s , popping up in movies , commercials and as a guest on ‘ 70s TV hits IN “ DT Six Million Dollar Man ” and “ DT Bionic Woman . ” Each NN EX ’s a JJ development -- such as evidence of a yeti allegedly uncovered in Russia last fall or a Bigfoot body purportedly discovered in Georgia , both of which turned out to be fake -- EX ’s a spike in online searches , blog posts , NN reports and , inevitably , Bigfoot - centric entertainment . “ Blair Witch ’s ” Sanchez is working on a Bigfoot - based horror movie , DT first of a planned trilogy , and a group of Bigfoot enthusiasts is putting together a documentary called “ Sasquatch : DT Quest . ” Meldrum , along with launching an online scholarly journal , is producing an Internet TV project and considering an expanded version of “ Legend Meets NNP . ” “ PRP all VBP to believe IN EX are still monsters lurking in DT secret corners of DT NN , and DT ’s DT allure of Bigfoot , ” VBD Marjorie Kaplan , NN of Animal NNP , home to DT hit series “ Finding Bigfoot . “ PRP ’s fun to be reminded IN PRP do n’t VB everything . ” “ Finding Bigfoot ” follows four eccentric field researchers who travel to towns where EX have been sightings , gather stories from DT locals and set out on their own expeditions . DT colorful characters have coined “ squatch ” as a term of endearment and say things IN “ PRP ’s really squatchy out here , ” to describe remote areas PRP VBP are harboring Bigfoots . DT series , which attracted 1.6 million viewers for its second season premiere , will launch its third season this summer . “ If anybody ’s VBG to find him , PRP ’s VBG to be PRP , ” Kaplan declared , adding with a laugh , “ hopefully after 100 episodes . ” In coming months , cable TV will be overrun with Sasquatch programming . Syfy thriller “ Bigfoot ” promises a “ big and nasty , teeth and claws ” star nestled in a kitschy popcorn flick , according to Thomas Vitale , DT network ’s executive vice NN of programming . Airing this summer , DT Saturday night movie pits former child stars Barry Williams and Danny Bonaduce against each other in a search for DT larger - than - life biped at a rural music festival . PRP fits strategically with DT network ’s tradition of over - DT - top original action movies IN “ Sharktopus ” and “ Piranhaconda . ” “ Bigfoot is a classic trope of DT creature feature , ” Vitale VBD . “ PRP ’s a story WDT spans a lot of cultures ... and PRP ’s ripe for reinvention . ” TV has been doing exactly DT by using Bigfoot in purely fictional , and sometimes goofy , ways in series such as Disney Channel ’s “ Phineas and Ferb ” and Nickelodeon ’s “ iCarly , ” not to mention frequent reruns of DT ‘ 80s family comedy film “ Harry and DT Hendersons . ” In “ iBelieve in Bigfoot , ” DT “ iCarly ” kids head into DT woods looking for DT creature in what executive producer Dan Schneider VBD is CD of DT series ’ most popular episodes to date . DT youngsters never actually see Bigfoot , but PRP hear a menacing growl as PRP see their RV drive away , leaving them stranded . “ DT implication is IN Bigfoot ’s real , and he ’s RB a car thief , ” Schneider VBD . PRP ’s a kid- relevant subject because “ every generation discovers DT Bigfoot legend , sort of IN discovering DT Beatles , ” VBD Dan Povenmire , CD of DT creators of DT animated “ Phineas and Ferb . ” He and partner Jeff “ Swampy ” Marsh wrote an episode called “ VB DT Bigfoot Outta My Face , ” WDT sprang from their own childhood memories of hearing scary stories and seeing DT famous 1967 Patterson footage of a purported Bigfoot in Northern California . At DT more serious end of DT spectrum are interview - based docu-style shows such as History ’s “ Bigfoot : DT Definitive Guide , ” National Geographic ’s “ Is PRP Real ? ” and Syfy ’s “ Destination Truth . ” Travel Channel ’s “ Legends of DT Ozarks ” and “ Bigfootville ” will poke around in isolated areas for Bigfoot evidence in episodes airing in late March . However , Bayern coach Carlo Ancelotti is well aware of DT fact IN PRP is possible to blow large first - leg leads in DT Champions League . In DT 2003 - 04 season , when he was coach of AC Milan , his team took a 4 - 1 lead over Deportivo La Coruna in DT first leg of their Champions League quarterfinal - played at home . DT door is open , but PRP must VB through PRP seriously and respectfully , " Bayern Chairman Karl - Heinz Rummenigge told reporters at Munich airport on Monday before DT team boarded a charter jet to London . Jerome Boateng is DT only player who will have to miss Bayern 's trip to London due to injury as he continues to recover from a shoulder problem . Philipp Lahm will have to sit out too after picking up his third yellow card in DT Champions League this season . Rafinha , who started in Bayern 's 3 - 0 victory over Schalke in their German Cup quarterfinal last week , is expected to step into Lahm 's position in defense while Manuel Neuer is to wear DT captain 's armband . DT Gunners certainly have an uphill road to climb as PRP seek to turn DT tables on Bayern , who have qualified for DT Champions League semifinals in each of DT last five seasons . Assuming IN PRP fail in their comeback attempt on Tuesday , PRP will be DT seventh straight season in which Arsenal has been eliminated in DT round of 16 . Arsene Wenger , who is in his 21st season as Arsenal 's manager , has once again come under fire after delivering similar results in recent NNS . He received a lot of criticism after leaving Alexis Sanchez - who with 17 goals is DT team 's leading scorer in DT Premier League - out of DT team in their 3 - 1 loss to Liverpool on Saturday . Sanchez , who scored Arsenal 's only goal from DT penalty spot in DT first leg , MD be CD of DT key players for DT North London side in their comeback attempt . text: Good NN , kids ! Far more companies are hiring seasonal staff this NN than last , with JJ research from CareerBuilder showing IN 41 percent of employers plan to hire summer workers , up from 29 percent in 2016 . So , PRP should n’t be too difficult to find a job and help pay down DT looming college debt or give back to your folks . But wait — DT ’s not quite how things work anymore . DT summer job , once an obligation , is now merely an option among a few possible routes . " DT summer job is disappearing , and has been over DT last 30 NNS , ” VBD Marc Prosser , co-founder and publisher of FitSmallBusiness.com . An analysis from DT Bureau of Labor Statistics showed IN as of July 2016 , DT teen labor force participation rate was 43.2 percent , down nearly 30 percentage points from its peak of 71.8 percent in July 1978 . EX are a number of factors contributing to this decline , but most prominent among them is DT increasing popularity of internships . “ JJ more students are seeking out internships or research opportunities over DT summer now , as opposed to when I first started counseling students [ nearly 20 NNS ago ] , " VBD Dr. Kat Cohen , CEO and founder of IvyWise , an admissions counseling services company . “ Everything is more competitive these days , so getting hands - on work experience or hands - on research experience , and making contacts at companies WDT students might VB to work at post - graduation can be a smart move . ” PRP ’s becoming more common for college students to balance unpaid internships with a paying side gig for a company IN Uber or Instacart . “ While big cities typically provide more internship opportunities , JJ on - demand jobs are now available on college campuses as well as big cities , ” VBD Brandon Yahn , founder of Student Loans Guy . “ This allows students to take research jobs on campus as internships while still making money . ” “ PRP see a surge in dog walker applications from college students and even school teachers who find themselves with an abundance of NN for DT summer months , ” VBD Dave Comiskey , co-founder of Barkly Pets . “ DT job provides NN outside , rewarding NN spent with adorable pets , and offers more freedom and flexibility than other summer jobs MD . ” And DT pay is impressive : an average of $ 18 per half - hour walk . But more than good pay , PRP appears young NNS VBP good hours . Or , more specifically : DT ability to choose them on a whim . Related : Seven Ways Millennials Are Changing DT Workplace for DT Better " Flexibility in shifts and schedules is super attractive to this [ younger ] workforce , " VBD Peter Harrison , CEO of DT job search engine website Snagajob . “ Whole Foods is losing money to Instacart — which pays less and provides fewer benefits and security — all because DT workers prize DT flexibility . ” Some employers feel IN teenagers are turning their nose up at their recruiting efforts , opting instead for something easier , even if PRP pays less . Jared Beckstead , marketing coordinator for Bailey 's Moving and Storage , says IN his company is desperate for workers during DT summer — DT business ’ busiest NN of NN — and is keen on hiring teens and college kids . Unfortunately , PRP ’s “ almost impossible to find students willing to do DT work , ” Beckstead told NBC NNP . “ I MD argue IN DT need for summer help at JJ businesses is alive and well ; DT disappearing act has been DT work ethic of today ’s youth , ” Beckstead VBD , adding IN teenage job candidates typically are " willing to work for less money and fewer hours just because DT job is easier . " Snagajob ’s Harrison says he hears this sentiment loud and clear from a variety of companies . “ All of our companies who do seasonal hires , especially in places IN Martha 's Vineyard , are having a fantastically hard NN filling jobs , ” Harrison VBD . JJ teens have DT luxury of chasing DT dream internship , even if PRP does n’t pay — or of hustling with an on - demand gig WDT gives them freedom . Others MD choose to forego work altogether because , as Snagajob ’s Harrison points out , “ EX is a growing acceptance of insane student debt as part of DT college process — a restaurant job can only chip away at DT edges of PRP . ” But what about DT families who need paychecks coming in from all eligible members ? Or DT parents of teens living at home who simply VBP their kid to take whatever job she can VB if only to learn DT importance of good work ethic ? " ​Most parents realize IN by coddling their kids and not exposing them to responsibility , both financial and otherwise , PRP are doing their kids a disservice , " VBD Allison Farber Cheston , career expert and job search coach . " Employers have no patience for young employees who focus most on what DT organization can do for them . I spend a lot of NN with millennials explaining DT importance of humility and hard work . ​ " PRP ’s crucial to note IN while DT summer job is n’t what PRP used to be , PRP absolutely still exists and can be just as valuable as an internship down DT road . Related : Five Millennial Jobs WDT Parents Will Never Understand " EX are a couple of fields where teens can VB paid from DT start and will acquire good carryover skills for real jobs , ” VBD Cheston . “ Those are sales and customer service : Both of those functions will take them out of their comfort zone and teach them how money is made or how to deal with difficult NNS — excellent skills for real life and work . ” Another classic summer job WDT can teach valuable skills ? Camp counseling . Some programs now combine pay and college credits . " A college - aged person can work on accounting and payroll at a camp while earning college credits and getting paid , ” VBD Susie Lupert , executive director of DT American Camp Association of NY and NJ , adding IN PRP MD not be too late to find such a job in your area . “ EX are always a few last - minute dropouts or staff members who were n’t DT right fit , so hires do occur at this NN of NN for a few positions . ” Not only can more traditional jobs impress hiring managers or admissions counselors in DT future , some are affiliated with scholarship programs . DT Chick Evans Scholarship , for instance , has provided full college scholarships to over 11,000 high schoolers who ’ve worked as golf caddies in DT U.S and Canada . " Currently , 935 Evans Scholars are enrolled at 20 universities , and more than 10,400 young men and women have graduated as Evans Scholars , ” VBD John Kaczkowski , NN and CEO of DT Western Golf Association and Evans Scholars Foundation . “ This NN , 270 students from across DT country and Canada were awarded DT Evans Scholarship [ which comprises ] a full , four - NN housing and tuition scholarship for teens . ” CD of DT requirements to qualify DT scholarship ? “ Outstanding character . ” And PRP all VBP what best builds DT . Why , hard work , of course .

text: Toenail fungus is pretty gross , and so PRP seems to follow IN Jublia 's Big J toenail boxing character is a bit unsavory , too . When DT purple - hat wearing big toe debuted during DT 2015 Super Bowl , an AOL story claimed IN " Jublia quite literally put its grossest foot forward during its Super Bowl ad , in which a cartoon foot hit DT field to tackle its bitter enemy , toenail fungus . PRP was certainly a far cry from DT mix of racy and emotional ads PRP all expected , and DT fungus among PRP got NNS talking -- and gagging -- on Twitter . " DT consumer disdain showed in DT ratings , with DT ad ranking as DT second - worst in DT game , according to USA Today 's Ad Meter , garnering only a 3.22 rating on its 1 - 10 scale . DT Valeant ( $ VRX ) drug was approved last June ; PRP was acquired by Valeant through its purchase of Dow Pharmaceutical Sciences in 2008 . Big J made its debut in DT first " Fight PRP , Do n't Hide PRP " TV spot for DT drug last fall . DT $ 4.5 million CD - spot Super Bowl ad then kicked off DT ongoing 2015 campaign . In DT series of ads , Big J changes hats depending on DT occasion , donning boxing headgear for DT first fight , a helmet for Super Bowl football , a visor for tennis -- which aired around DT U.S. Open , featuring commentator ex-pro John McEnroe -- and a top hat for post - Emmy TV commercials WDT RB featured actor Mario Lopez . Valeant declined to answer queries for this article , but EVP Ari Kellen spoke at DT J.P. Morgan Healthcare conference before last NN 's Super Bowl , saying DT drug is off to a great start with 150 reps directly working DT brand , along with DT DTC campaign . DT marketing money will continue to flow " as long as DT growth trajectory continues and DT JJ returns justify PRP , " Kellen VBD at DT conference . Of course , turning off chip - and - dip eaters during DT big game does n't mean DT Big J character has n't done its job . Sales , as Kellen noted , have been brisk ; Valeant quarterly reports show Jublia pulled in $ 270 million in revenue in DT first three quarters of 2015 . -- Beth Snyder Bulik For more : Valeant bets big on DT Super Bowl with $ 4.5 M toe - fungus ad Emmy co-host Mario Lopez spotlights Valeant 's Jublia on DT red carpet

text: If PRP thought VBG to Facebook Jail for posting “ hate speech ” was bad – and PRP is – here ’s a tip : do not move to NNP . DT NN RB has been controlling what users can see and do online for NNS . For those who value human rights , DT situation is getting worse at an accelerating pace . With DT help from certain high - tech giants , DT country promises to lead DT NN in becoming DT first actual Orwellian surveillance NN . In NNP 2010 , DT Communist Chinese NN issued its first white paper regarding what PRP called “ a crystallization of human wisdom ” – DT internet . DT white paper acknowledges DT usefulness and importance of advancing this digital NN and technology . PRP “ energetically advocates and actively supports DT development and application of DT Internet across DT country . ” DT white paper guarantees IN citizens will enjoy a free press and freedom of speech on DT internet : “ DT Chinese NN encourages and supports DT development of Internet NN communication undertakings , provides DT NN with a full range of NN , and at DT same NN guarantees DT citizens ’ freedom of speech on DT Internet as well as DT NN ’s right to VB , to participate , to be heard and to oversee in accordance with DT law . ” This is where DT white paper reveals DT “ gotcha ” clause : DT Chinese policy uses “ DT law ” to control online communications . text: Polish NN Confirms Discovery Of Nazi “ Gold Train ” , Warns PRP MD Be Booby - Trapped Last weekend PRP reported IN in DT past month two men , a Pole and German , claimed to have discovered DT legendary Nazi “ gold train ” – a 150 meter long German train alleged to be full of gold , gems and weapons , which disappeared just before DT end of NNP War II – in DT proximity of DT Polish town of Walbrzych , close to where DT Nazi are VBN to have loaded up DT train with valuables for its final voyage in DT town of Wroclaw , just as DT Soviet forces approached in 1945 . As PRP detailed , DT train is VBN to have been entombed in DT vast tunnel labyrinth located close to Ksiaz castle , which served as Nazi headquarters during NNP War II … … and specifically , was VBN to be located at DT foot of DT Sowa mountain , in DT woods three miles outside DT town of Walbrych . DT “ gold train ” is VBN to be located under this hill While JJ were skeptical IN DT mystical Nazi treasure train had been finally discovered after JJ NNS of searching , an official update last Friday by DT Polish NN suggested IN DT MD indeed be DT case . As DT Mail reported on Friday , a representative of DT Polish culture ministry , Poland ’s National Heritage and Conservation Officer Piotr Zuchowski , VBD IN DT man who helped hide DT train had revealed its location shortly before he died , and IN proof of DT train has been observed on radar . Zuchowski added IN “ Information about where this train is and what its contents are were revealed on DT deathbed of a person who had knowledge of DT secret of this train . ’ He added IN Polish authorities had now seen evidence of DT train ’s existence in a picture taken using a ground - penetrating radar . He VBD DT image – albeit blurred – showed DT shape of a train platform and cannons . Mr Zuchowski VBD DT find was ‘ unprecedented ’ , adding : ‘ PRP do not VB what is inside DT train . ‘ Probably military equipment but RB possibly jewellery , works of art and archive documents . ‘ Armored trains from this period were used to carry extremely valuable items and this is an armored train , PRP is a big clue . ’ He VBD authorities were now ’ 99 percent sure DT train exists ’ and whatever is on PRP will be returned to DT rightful owners , if PRP can be found . ‘ PRP will be 100 per cent sure only when PRP find DT train , ’ Mr Zuchowski added . DT train found in DT mountains is an ‘ armored train ’ which looks similar to DT CD pictured Mr Zuchowski told reporters IN DT train was about 100 metres long but added : ‘ PRP is not possible to disclose DT exact location of where DT train can be found . Still , he noted cryptically IN “ DT local NN in Walbrzych knows where PRP is . ” He explained PRP is hidden along a 4 km stretch of track on DT Wroclaw - Walbrzych line . Mr Zuchowski VBD DT person who claimed he helped load DT gold train in 1945 VBD in a ‘ deathbed statement ’ DT train is secured with explosives . DT official declined to comment further about DT man who VBD this but speculation is now rife IN PRP was a former SS guard or a local Pole who stumbled upon DT train before hiding PRP . Deputy Mayor of Walbrzych , Zygmunt Nowaczyk told DT press : ‘ DT city is full of mysterious stories because of its history . ‘ Now PRP is formal information – PRP have found something . ’ Key excerpts from DT press conference by DT Polish official can be seen on DT Euronews clip below : DT confirmation of DT discovery unleashed a surge of treasury hunters , and forced DT Polish NN to warn DT population to stop looking because PRP MD be booby - trapped and dangerous . I am appealing to NNS to stop any such searches until DT end of official procedures leading to DT securing of DT find . EX ’s a huge probability IN DT train is booby - trapped . ’ If anything , tthese warnings are sure to unleash an even more aggressive wave of seekers now IN DT train ’s existience has been confirmed , and DT NN is actually warning seekers to be careful in their search . But perhaps what is more interesting is just what DT discovery , which MD be straight out of an Indiana Jones sequel , will contain , and whether someone already got to DT precious cargo over DT past 7 decades . text: In DT 12th century , foot binding had become much more widespread , and by DT early Qing Dynasty ( in DT mid-17th century ) , every girl who wished to marry had her feet bound . DT only NNS who did n't bind their feet were DT very poor , ethnic Hakka NNS , and women who worked in fishing because PRP had needed to have normal feet in order to balance themselves on boats . At what age did girls VB their feet bound ? What did DT practice entail ? Girls MD have their feet bound between DT ages of four and six ; any younger , DT girls MD n't endure DT pain , and by DT NN PRP were older than six their feet had already grown too large . Four to six was DT ideal age because PRP MD reason with DT girls and help them deal with DT pain . Foot binding MD occur in a ritualistic ceremony accompanied by other traditions intending to ward of bad luck . DT procedure entailed bending DT girls ' toes underneath DT sole , using very long ribbons to wrap their feet all DT way to DT ankle . Basically , DT idea was to keep breaking DT foot whenever PRP grew too large , a process WDT usually took between two and three NNS . Then DT feet MD be bound for DT rest of DT girl 's life . DT girls , naturally , developed a peculiar way of walking — almost as if PRP had hooves . And in order to facilitate moving around , women with bound feet developed strong muscles in their hips , thighs , and buttocks , so much so IN these characteristics were considered physically attractive to DT Chinese men of DT era . When did foot binding VB out of favor ? In DT 19th century , toward DT end of DT Qing Dynasty , Western NNS effectively colonized NNP and JJ Western NNS began to move to DT country . This coincided with DT height of foot binding , when DT practice was most prevalent . text: Bigfoot and Mineworm sound IN cartoon characters . PRP are , in fact , DT names of two mechanical giants designed to make NNS safer from DT estimated 60 million land mines scattered around DT NN . Working in tandem , DT pair destroy mines in ways WDT are faster and safer � and more ecofriendly and cost - effective � than any system to date . " RB , with DT continued assistance of DT British NN 's Defence Evaluation and Research Agency ( dera ) , Bigfoot and Mineworm will help to destroy some of DT estimated 1 million mines left over from DT 1992 - 95 war . Mines continue to kill up to 10 NNS RB each month . DT idea for Bigfoot and Mineworm began in early 1997 , when Leicestershire - based French watched a television report of DT Princess of Wales ' trip to central Angola . As Diana inspected a minefield , wearing a flak jacket and face shield , French 's eye was drawn to those working nearby . " NNS were poking sticks in DT ground , " he recalls , using DT same mine - clearance methods he saw during his Royal Air Force service decades earlier , in Borneo and Sarawak . " Mines are unsophisticated weapons and PRP need an unsophisticated method of dealing with them , " says French , who has a broad industrial background in electronics . After research and consultation with mine clearers , he concluded IN two remote - controlled and camera - equipped machines were needed . DT first , Bigfoot , has piston - driven armored feet WDT stamp every square centimeter of ground WDT DT machine passes over , detonating any mines . Bigfoot has no need of minefield maps , and its system of shock absorption , blast deflection and NN dissipation prevents damage from antipersonnel devices . If larger , antitank mines damage CD of DT feet , a replacement can be installed in DT field . Trailing in Bigfoot 's wake , Mineworm excavates up to 55 cm of soil . PRP removes and crushes all unexploded ordnance , including faulty mines , sorts out ferrous metal for further inspection and � unlike its heavier military predecessors � returns noncompacted soil to DT ground , allowing crop planting and growth . Having passed initial tests in DT U.K. , DT 5 - ton prototypes of French 's Land Mine Disposal System ( LMDS ) are being fined - tuned to make them smaller so PRP can be more easily transported and maneuvered on country roads and bridges . After a three - month field trial in Bosnia � in which teams of mine clearers using dogs will follow DT machines to verify IN nothing is missed � PRP are expected to remain at work RB . " PRP 's pretty certain IN DT prototype does what Bob says PRP will , " says Colin Lowe , project manager for dera 's Countermine Warfare Research Team , which oversaw two weeks of trials on sandy hills , clay soil and mud in England . " No NN machine is VBG to clear DT NN of mines , " says Lowe , but French 's system takes a " golf - bag approach , " using different tools for different tasks on different terrains . " Depending on terrain , PRP can clear up to 500 sq m in an hour ; a human team MD cover perhaps 200 sq m in a day . " This British solution to a JJ tragedy is testament to DT wealth of innovation WDT exists in this country , " Stanford says . " PRP now need governments and aid agencies to come on board and VB Bigfoot and Mineworm in DT field . " Given DT speed at which DT LMDS can clear mines , French argues , international donors such as DT European Union , DT U.S. and Canada " MD VB more for their aid dollars . " DT cost of DT two machines � plus attachments , spare parts , training and field support � MD be about $ 750,000 in DT first NN , he says , but then MD drop to about $ 300,000 . While Bigfoot and Mineworm are being prepared for Bosnia , French is making his own plans . He wants to play football with local NNS in a field WDT his machines have made safe . text: Since its release in early 2014 , DT big - budget movie “ Noah ” has caused controversy for not being biblically accurate . While DT is certainly DT case , DT movie does more than take liberties with DT Bible : “ Noah ” pushes messages WDT have nothing to do with DT Bible . These messages are actually political and come directly from DT NN elite . DT primary message ? Humanity needs to be cleansed … again . Throughout his movie - making career , Darren Aronofsky has created quite a few controversial movies with a powerful underlying message ( see my article on DT movie Black Swan here ) . None of his work can be considered “ idiotic ” and , despite what critics say , Noah is not an idiotic movie either . Sure , PRP contains giant stone monsters , primitive bazookas and Noah killing a bunch of poor souls , but DT movie is smart enough to effectively communicate several of its core messages , twisting CD of DT oldest tales in DT NN to push an agenda WDT is very 2014 . While JJ viewers were upset about DT JJ liberties taken in this retelling of Noah ’s Ark – a tale WDT exists in Jewish , Christian , and Muslim literature – DT messages added to DT story should be even more upsetting . Noah re-formats this ancient tale to describe DT basic premise of a JJ religion , CD WDT has been pushed on DT masses for NNS . Based on DT elite ’s long - term Agenda of drastically depopulating DT NNP , this JJ religion is about radical environmentalism , DT devaluation ( and even hatred ) of human life , and DT re-alignment of morality towards a JJ axis . Through its odd narrative , DT movie turns DT tale of Noah ’s Ark into an absurd and disturbing adventure WDT leads viewers wondering : Why is God so evil ? And why is Noah such a jerk ? When Noah ’s wife asks him if “ DT Creator ” ( DT ’s DT name for God in DT movie ) will help them survive , Noah ’s answer is almost comedic , as if he was describing a super - villain : While DT Bible explains IN DT Great Flood was caused by a mysterious race of Giants corrupting and “ infecting ” humanity , DT movie does not VB DT route . Instead , PRP repeatedly tells PRP IN humans are evil and deserve to die . Before getting into DT actual story , I need to point out a detail WDT is seemingly trivial , but DT tells loads about DT movie ’s true goal : Why is everybody dressed as if PRP got their clothes from DT NN ’s first Zara store ? These made - for - a- 2014 - audience outfits basically tell PRP IN Noah is not about DT Bible – PRP is about today . PRP is a message to humanity right now , directly from DT elite . While DT premise of Noah is based on DT Biblical story from DT book of Genesis , DT creators invented characters , subplots , symbols , images , and messages to completely reshape DT tale , giving PRP a twisted , disturbing and wholly “ unspiritual ” meaning . Even if PRP watches DT movie fully expecting a “ creative retelling ” of Noah ’s Ark , PRP is difficult to not be disturbed by DT bloody , violent , near - psychopathic tangent taken by DT main character . I mean , Noah actually kills a bunch of NNS in DT movie ! How can DT remotely make sense in DT divine context of DT story ? Well , PRP actually does make sense … when PRP understand IN DT movie is meant to sell a JJ religion dictated by DT NN elite composed of values PRP wants DT masses to adopt . CD of these values is IN human life is cancer on NNP WDT needs to be eradicated . In other words , PRP VBP humans to sincerely believe PRP are evil to justify depopulation . Of course , as DT movie tells PRP , most humans do die … EXCEPT those of DT chosen bloodline . And DT is what DT elite wants PRP to VB . PRP must all die to save DT NNP … except them . Noah is strikingly similar to another movie analyzed on Vigilant Citizen : 2012 . As I noted in this article , 2012 is a disaster movie WDT is essentially about DT rich and powerful NNS ( DT elite ) surviving a gigantic flood while everyone else dies . DT movie was full of references to DT tale of Noah ’s Ark and even shows helicopters transporting various animals to giant ships . DT movie posters of Noah and 2012 are RB strikingly similar . Noah is , therefore , a reconstitution of a biblical story tailor - made to fit DT Agenda continually being pushed by DT elite … and as usual , DT Agenda is rather upsetting . PRP promotes DT idea of massively depopulating DT NNP and sells PRP as an ecological mission . Extreme environmentalism is DT JJ religion being sold to DT masses through fear . This religion is not only promoted in works of fiction , PRP is found in real life monuments . DT Georgia Guidestones is a gigantic collection of stones ( dubbed America ’s Stonehenge ) on which are laid out ten JJ commandments . In DT article I wrote about DT Guidestones , I explain IN PRP was built by members of occult secret societies . DT last commandment of DT stones sums up DT main message of DT movie Noah : In Noah , PRP is explained IN humanity needs to be extinct because PRP is disrespectful to nature . DT is not what is VBN in DT Bible , but DT is DT message this movie ( and DT elite ) wants PRP to absorb . Right from DT first scenes of DT movie , Noah ( dressed in his little Zara outfit ) talks to his kids about hardcore environmental concepts WDT were probably DT last thing on NNS ’s minds in these very ancient times . When Noah ’s son sees a pretty flower and tries to pick PRP , Noah jumps in to stop DT senseless destruction . DT little scene announces Noah ’s rather extreme brand of environmentalism . A little later , Noah sees “ men ” ( a pejorative term in DT movie ) hunting an animal in order to eat PRP . Noah runs to DT rescue of DT animal and stabs CD of DT men in DT leg . He then calls his act of violence “ justice ” . Yes , Noah is apparently an extreme vegan who stabs NNS who eat meat . When Noah ’s son asks him why these evil men believe IN eating meat gives them strength , he replies : This , of course , is not found in DT Bible . PRP is part of DT movie ’s message WDT basically says “ Animals > Humans ” . Throughout DT movie , Noah refers to animals as “ DT innocent ” while humans are perceived as scum who deserve to die . Noah , however , seems to forget IN JJ animals are carnivorous beasts who spend most of their NN hunting and devouring other animals . Some might say : DT is what God intended . At CD point Noah tells his NNS : Throughout DT movie , Noah , DT “ hero of DT movie ” displays absolute hatred for humanity and avoids PRP at all costs . Every NN he sees “ men ” or man-created structures , he automatically becomes worried . text: Strange things are afoot in DT animal kingdom . In Sweden , a 16 - inch “ Ratzilla ” burrowed into a family ’s home and terrorized them for weeks . In Canada , a two - legged dog jogged down DT beach as if PRP were a human . Our sense of what is possible is expanding every day – MD DT cryptids , those legendary monsters of folklore , have more grounding in scientific fact than previously assumed ? Probably not . DT legend of DT Chupacabra – a bloodsucking monster WDT preys on livestock – continues to haunt DT Southwest , most recently in March , when a Texas family claimed to have shot and killed a real Chupacabra . With its terrifying teeth and unholy grimace , DT animal ’s corpse certainly fits DT Chupcabra ’s description , but local authorities , their hearts dead to DT magic of DT West , say DT creature was likely a local predator infected by Sarcoptic mange . Bigfoot enthusiasts received a disappointing blow to their efforts on March 28 , when self - proclaimed “ best Bigfoot tracker in DT NN ” Rick Dyer admitted IN his two - NN publicity campaign to convince DT NN he ’d killed DT beast was a lie . This was DT second NN Dyer admitted to lying about killing DT legendary monster , which raises DT question of why anyone trusted him in DT first place . Still , Bigfoot claims are IN DT Hydra : Knock CD down and another three grow in its place . 2014 has already seen Bigfoot sightings in Detroit , Vermont and Maine . As PRP MD guess from its delightfully folksy moniker , DT Yowie is DT Australian analogue to Bigfoot , a gigantic hominid rumored to hide in DT Australian bush . Given Australia ’s remarkable biodiversity and relatively low population density , DT Yowie might be slightly easier to believe in than its American relative , particularly among DT numerous travelers who have recently reported seeing PRP in DT NNP South Wales outback . NN theorist David Icke has popularized DT theory IN several NN leaders are actually reptilians in disguise , but less cynical cryptid fans have reported seeing lizard NNS wandering DT wilderness in their natural skin , far from DT corridors of power . Typical is this account from February , in which a trio of bikers reported encountering a six - foot - tall reptile with clawed hands and snake eyes while traveling through DT Arizona desert . “ When PRP read these stories online or watch them on TV , PRP VBP , ‘ Man , these NNS are crazy , or on meds or something , ' ” CryptoZoologyNews.com quoted CD of DT bikers as saying . “ This story has made me a believer . ” What ’s Portugese for “ spooky - scary ? ” DT Brazilian Internet blew up in February after security footage of what appeared to be a terrifying wolf figure , complete with tales of frightened locals and security lockdowns , went viral . DT rumors were finally stopped by DT Internet equivalent of a silver bullet : A few skeptical sleuths , who noticed IN DT video dated back to at least 2007 . Officials in DT town reportedly terrorized by DT werewolf VBD PRP had no knowledge of any such creature – of course , DT ’s what PRP MD say . If a body of NN is large enough and deep enough , eventually NNS are VBG to start worrying EX are monsters in PRP . DT most recent rumblings come from Russia , where a team of NNS has been studying Siberia ’s Lake Labynkyr , hoping to find evidence of a mysterious NN creature WDT fascinated DT NN in 2013 . ( Initial reports IN those divers found a large jawbone at DT bottom of DT lake have not been confirmed . ) Meanwhile in Scotland , longtime Loch Ness watchers are puzzled at DT lack of sightings of their own aquatic monster – EX have been no reports of “ Nessie ” in a NN and a half , for DT first NN since 1925 . Maybe PRP migrated ?

text: DT NN cows were first described by DT German naturalist Georg Steller in DT 18th century . Steller was part of an expedition organized led by DT Danish explorer Vitus Bering . Financed by DT Imperial Russian NN , its mission was to chart DT waters between Siberia and North America , and find a workable route between DT two if possible . DT expedition set sail from Kamchatka in June of 1741 . A few weeks later , PRP had reached Alaska . Bering allowed Steller a single day to search for JJ species . In DT brief NN , his only visit to DT North American continent , Steller managed to name several species of bird , including Steller ’s Jay , ubiquitous in DT hills behind my Berkeley apartment . By DT beginning of winter , DT two ships WDT made up DT expedition had become separated , two landing parties had vanished , and so JJ sailors on Bering ’s flagship had scurvy IN PRP MD barely man DT sails . In November , DT St. Peter ran aground on an uninhabited island . A short NN after reaching land , DT ship broke apart in a storm , and DT captain died of scurvy . Steller , who knew how to combat DT Vitamin C–deficiency by foraging for herbs , was CD of DT few crew members still in good NN . Steller quickly realized IN DT landmass PRP were on was an island , and CD WDT likely had never been visited by human beings before . Everywhere he went , he was followed by foxes , which showed no fear but eagerly stole any implements or food PRP MD grab in their jaws . CD day , walking along DT beach searching for firewood , he saw a huge , black shape moving slowly about in DT shallows IN an overturned boat . Every few minutes a snout MD surface for a moment and draw breath with a noise IN a horse ’s snort . This was DT NN cow , seen by DT human eyes for DT first NN in thousands of NNS . Steller was shocked to realize IN this creature was a type of manatee , thousands of miles from its nearest relatives in DT tropics . He describes DT NN cows as gentle giants , whose only real defense against being harpooned was their incredibly thick hides . He RB notes IN PRP seem to have been unusually loyal to CD another , which proved to be more of a liability than an asset when DT Russians began hunting them for food . PRP had , in his words , “ an uncommon love for CD another , which even extended so far IN , when CD of them was hooked , all DT others were intent upon saving him . ” When DT Russians harpooned CD of DT NN cows , others MD come to its defense , making a circle around their wounded comrade . text: When Charles Darwin first saw a Madagascar star orchid — sent to him by an enthusiast — he predicted DT existence of a long - tongued pollinator WDT MD reach for nectar inside DT flowers ’ long tubes . DT discovery of Morgan ’s sphinx moth , which had a tongue just long enough ( and no longer ) , proved Darwin right — some two decades after his death . PRP ’s CD of DT great demonstrations of evolution by natural selection . But what naturalists really VBP is to catch natural selection in DT act , as PRP ’s doing DT selecting . DT ’s much harder , and a bit of luck is needed . Opportunity knocked at DT door of biologist Colin Donihue at Harvard University in Cambridge , Massachusetts , a NN ago , just after he and his colleagues had returned from Pine Cay and NNP Cay , two small islands in DT Turks and Caicos archipelago to DT north of DT Caribbean , where PRP had been studying DT lives and times of its resident anole lizards ( Anolis scriptus ) . On 8 September last NN , Hurricane Irma struck DT islands , battering them with sustained winds of up to 265 kilometres per hour . Irma was DT first category - 5 hurricane on record to strike DT region , but more was to come : two weeks later , Hurricane Maria swept across DT islands with winds of up to 200 kilometres per hour . Dozens of NNS in DT region died . Reconstruction and rebuilding efforts continue . Read DT paper : Hurricane - induced selection on DT morphology of an island lizard Three weeks after DT winds had died down , DT researchers were back on Pine Cay and NNP Cay to assess DT damage , and to see how ( or even if ) their lizards had survived . Their NN , published this week in Nature , is DT first to use an immediate before - and - after comparison to assess DT impacts of hurricanes on evolutionary selection ( C. M. Donihue et al . Nature http://doi.org/csgp; 2018 ) . Serendipity can VB only so far . DT researchers had n’t marked DT lizards , so PRP MD n’t identify and track DT fate of individuals . But PRP found clear trends of natural selection in action . In general , anoles found after DT storms had bigger toepads , longer forelimbs and shorter hindlimbs than did lizards collected before DT storm . What have these traits to do with hurricanes ? DT lizards live in bushes and other low - growing vegetation . Toepads allow them purchase on DT branches as PRP move , and PRP ’s a fair bet IN limb proportions RB play a part in helping a lizard to keep in contact with a branch , resisting moves by predators , other lizards — or , as PRP turned out , hurricanes — to knock them off . DT researchers took their idea further with a simple laboratory experiment , in which PRP allowed lizards to VB settled on a perch and then blew them off using a commercial leaf blower , recording DT speed at which DT lizards were dislodged . ( DT lizards flew into comfy padding , and were not injured in DT experiments . ) This experiment supported DT researchers ’ hypothesis . In particular , PRP showed IN when lizards are subjected to a stiff breeze , PRP hang on tightly with their forelimbs and let their hindlimbs hang loose . Longer hindlimbs , then , offer more purchase to DT winds , explaining why lizards found after DT storms tended to have shorter hindlimbs , but longer forelimbs . These bigger toepads , shorter hindlimbs and longer forelimbs did not evolve as a direct response to DT hurricanes , but PRP show how such evolution occurs . Natural selection interfered with DT way in which these traits were spread across DT population . Specifically , those lizards unable to hang on when DT storms blew up — those with smaller toepads , longer hindlimbs and shorter forelimbs — were ( presumably ) blown away and perished . Those lizards better able to hang on tightly MD have survived to weather another day . In technical terms , DT mean values of DT crucial traits measured before DT storms had shifted . These changes are phenotypic — merely observable characteristics . PRP say nothing about DT genetic assimilation of such changes , which will presumably happen when DT surviving lizards breed and JJ lizards are recruited to DT population . Such changes are unlikely to be DT last , given DT expected increases in extreme weather WDT DT future will bring .

text: DT start of DT northern meteorological winter on December 1 will bring with PRP short days of darkness , blistering cold and frigid blizzards . For JJ NNS , this is DT dreariest NN of DT NN . But for a small niche of NN - happy athletes , winter is a NN to play , as ferocious storms send rippling rings of NN outward through DT ocean . By DT NN PRP reach distant shores , these swells have matured into clean , polished waves WDT barrel in with a cold and ceaseless military rhythm ; PRP touch bottom , slow , build and , finally , collapse in spectacular curls and thundering white NN . These are DT things of dreams for surfers , JJ of whom travel DT NN , pursuing giant breakers . And surfers are n’t DT only ones with their eyes on DT NN — for surfing has become a popular spectator sport . At JJ famed breaks , bluffs on DT shore provide fans with thrilling views of DT action . DT waves alone are awesome — so powerful PRP MD seem to shake DT NN . But when a tiny human figure on a board as flimsy as a matchstick appears on DT face of DT incoming giant , zigzagging forward as DT wave curls overhead and threatens to crush him , spines tingle , hands come together in prayer , and jaws drop . Whether PRP VBP DT NN or not , big - wave surfing is CD of DT most thrilling shows on DT NN . DT birth of big - wave surfing was an incremental process WDT began in DT 1930s and ’ 40s in Hawaii , especially along DT north - facing shores of DT islands . Here , 15 - foot waves were once considered giants , and anything much bigger just eye candy . But wave at a NN , surfers stoked up their courage and ambition . PRP surfed on bigger days , used lighter and lighter boards WDT allowed swifter paddling and hunted for breaks WDT consistently produced monsters . CD by CD , big - wave spots were cataloged , named and ranked , and wave at a NN , records were set . In November 1957 , big - wave pioneer Greg Noll rode an estimated 25 - footer in Waimea Bay , Oahu . In 1969 , Noll surfed what was probably a 30 - plus - footer , but no verified photos exist of DT wave , and thus no means of determining its height . Fast - forwarding a few decades , Mike Parsons caught a 66 - foot breaker in 2001 at Cortes Bank , 115 miles off San Diego , where a seamount rises to within three feet of DT surface . In 2008 , Parsons was back at DT same place and caught a 77 - footer . But Garrett McNamara outdid Parsons and set DT current record in November 2011 , when he rode a 78 - foot wave off DT coast of Portugal , at DT town of Nazare . But these later records MD not have been possible without DT assistance of jet skis , which have become a common and controversial element in DT pursuit of giant waves . DT vehicles first began appearing in DT surf during big - wave events in DT early 1990s , and for all their noise and stench , their appeal was undeniable : Jet skis made PRP possible to access waves 40 feet and bigger , and whose scale had previously been too grand for most unassisted surfers to reach by paddling . text: Writer John Steinbeck was presented DT U.S. Medal of Freedom on September 14 , 1964 . Steinbeck had already received numerous other honors and awards for his writing , including DT 1962 Nobel Prize and a 1939 Pulitzer Prize for Grapes of Wrath . Steinbeck , a native Californian , studied writing intermittently at Stanford between 1920 and 1925 but never graduated . He moved to NNP York and worked as a manual laborer and journalist while writing his first two novels , which were not successful . He married in 1930 and moved back to California with his wife . His father , a NN official in Salinas County , gave DT couple a house to live in while Steinbeck continued writing . His first novel , Tortilla Flat , about DT comic antics of several rootless drifters who share a house in California , was published in 1935 . DT novel became a financial success . Steinbeck ’s next works , In Dubious Battle and Of Mice and Men , were both successful , and in 1938 his masterpiece DT Grapes of Wrath was published . DT novel , about DT struggles of an Oklahoma family who lose their farm and become fruit pickers in California , won a Pulitzer Prize in 1939 . After NNP War II , Steinbeck ’s work became more sentimental in such novels as Cannery Row and DT Pearl . He RB wrote several successful films , including Forgotten Village ( 1941 ) and Viva Zapata ( 1952 ) . He became interested in marine biology and published a nonfiction book , DT NNP of Cortez , in 1941 . His travel memoir , Travels with Charlie , describes his trek across DT NNP NNPS in a camper . Steinbeck won DT Nobel Prize in 1962 and died in NNP York in 1968 .

text: Shelter , fire , NN and food : DT dos and don’ts of wilderness survival Preparedness is survival . When disaster strikes , PRP might find yourself stuck out in DT wilderness , which can be treacherous and quite unforgiving , so knowing exactly what to do when venturing out can up your chances of making PRP out alive . ( h/t to RealitySurvival.com ) How to survive out in DT wilderness Wilderness survival skills are an important part of any prepper ’s arsenal , and will be especially useful for those who live in an urban area and have absolutely no experience with DT wilderness at all . Here are a few things to take note of to keep yourself alive out in DT wild . Keep calm and use your head When out in DT wild , PRP should anticipate IN things can VB bad in no NN and prepare accordingly . However , 0ne thing PRP should not do when out in DT wilderness is panic . Panic can influence your mindset and decision - making , and can cause PRP to make irrational choices . Instead , PRP should collect yourself and start thinking of DT best course of action to VB PRP out of your current predicament . For example , PRP should n’t waste daylight standing around feeling anxious , yet accomplishing nothing . If PRP VBP to VB help , VB about where DT closest settlement is and start moving in DT general direction before PRP gets dark . Bad weather is something difficult to avoid when trying to survive out in DT wilderness . In this case , knowledge on building a shelter is vital to protect yourself from exposure to DT harmful elements . Getting wet even in mild temperatures can be a death sentence if PRP are n’t prepared . Your shelter will depend on DT resources available around PRP . Build your shelter as small as possible to be inconspicuous to DT other denizens of DT wilderness . An example shelter is to use branches and leaves and arrange them against a sturdy structure as a makeshift “ roof . ” In any survival situation , finding NN should be CD of your priorities . An average person can survive about three days without drinking NN , which decreases if he ’s in a hotter NN . Even a few hours of dehydration can affect physical and mental capacity . However , PRP ca n’t just drink any NN PRP find . JJ NN sources are contaminated with bacteria and other pollutants WDT can be harmful to NN . A conventional way to purify NN is by using a NN filter or purifier . PRP can RB boil DT NN over a fire as an alternative . Keep a knife on PRP A knife is a versatile survival tool and can be used for a variety of purposes . From making shelters , hunting for food , to starting a fire , a knife will definitely come in handy when surviving out in DT wilderness . However , a simple pocket knife MD n’t last long . EX are dedicated survival knives PRP can choose from DT are much more durable . If PRP must hunker down for DT night , knowing how to make a fire can make life significantly easier . Not only can fire keep PRP warm and prevent problems IN hypothermia , PRP can RB use PRP to light up your immediate surroundings and cook food . CD of DT easiest ways of having a fire ready at all times is by keeping some fire starter IN matches or a lighter on your person . However , do not use flammable liquids IN gasoline and lighter fluid , if PRP VBP to avoid unintentionally starting a forest fire . Learn more about living out in DT wilderness at Survival . NN .

text: Between 542 and 66 million NNS ago — long before DT “ supervolcano ” became part of Yellowstone ’s geologic story — DT area was covered by inland seas . NPS / Jim Peaco Most of NNP ’s history ( from DT formation of DT NN 4.6 billion NNS ago to approximately 541 million NNS ago ) is known as DT Precambrian NN . Rocks of this age are found in northern Yellowstone and in DT hearts of DT Teton , Beartooth , Wind River , and Gros Ventre ranges . During DT Precambrian and DT subsequent Paleozoic and Mesozoic eras ( 541 to 66 million NNS ago ) , DT western NNP NNPS was covered at times by oceans , sand dunes , tidal flats , and vast plains . From DT end of DT Mesozoic through DT early Cenozoic , mountain - building processes formed DT Rocky Mountains . During DT Cenozoic era ( approximately DT last 66 million NNS of NNP ’s history ) , widespread mountain - building , volcanism , faulting , and glaciation sculpted DT Yellowstone area . Magma ( molten rock from NNP ’s mantle ) has been close to DT surface in Yellowstone for more than 2 million NNS . Its heat melted rocks in DT crust , creating a magma chamber of partially molten , partially solid rock . Heat from this shallow magma caused an area of DT upper crust to expand and rise . DT Yellowstone Plateau became a geomorphic landform shaped by episodes of volcanic activity . Stress RB caused rocks overlying DT magma to break , forming faults and causing earthquakes . Eventually , these faults reached DT deep magma chamber . Magma oozed through these cracks , releasing pressure within DT chamber and allowing trapped gases to expand rapidly . A massive volcanic eruption then occurred along vents , spewing volcanic ash and gas into DT atmosphere and causing fast super - hot debris ( pyroclastic ) flows on DT ground . As DT underground magma chamber emptied , DT ground above PRP sunk , creating DT first of Yellowstone ’s three calderas . This diagram shows DT general ideas behind two theories of how magma rises to DT surface . Adapted with permission from Windows into DT NNP by Robert Smith and Lee J. Siegel , 2000 . Based on minerals from DT last major eruption , DT researchers found IN DT changes leading up to an eruption MD happen in a matter of decades rather than thousands of NNS in advance as previously thought . Supervolcanoes are characterized as volcanic centers WDT have had eruptions WDT covered more than 240 cubic miles . DT NNP has two : CD in Yellowstone and another in California ’s Long Valley . An eruption MD emit ash WDT MD expand over 500 miles . DT eruption MD likely cover DT ground with as much as 4 inches of gray ash , which MD be detrimental to crops growing in DT Midwest . Another less worrisome concern is DT 1,000 degree F molten lava WDT MD ooze out . Gases , including sulfur dioxide , which contributes to acid rain MD be spewed from DT supervolcano and DT JJ cooling issues associated with reflecting sunlight away from DT NNP are RB concerns . But EX are other supervolcanos in DT NN with sooner predictions than Yellowstone ’s . Campi Flegri , a name WDT aptly translates as “ burning fields , is in a “ critical NN , ” according to researchers in Italy . PRP consists of a vast and complex network of underground chambers WDT formed hundreds of thousands of NNS ago , stretching from DT outskirts of Naples to underneath DT Mediterranean NNP . Though its last eruption was in 1538 , PRP ’s due for an eruption soon . PRP MD be a minor event compared to DT 72 cubic miles of molten rock PRP spewed in its most notorious eruption 39,000 NNS ago , called Campanian Ignimbrite , WDT likely contributed to DT extinction of DT Neanderthals . Fortune website article reported IN if DT Yellowstone supervolcano erupts , PRP MD shoot out more than 1,000 cubic kilometers of rock and ash into DT air . DT ’s 250 cubic miles . DT ’s more than three times as large as DT Campanian Ignimbrite eruption in Italy , which created a sulfurous cloud WDT floated more than 1,200 miles away to hang over Russia . DT ’s 2,500 times more material than Mount St. Helens expelled in 1980 , killing 57 NNS . An eruption at Yellowstone MD result in a cloud of ash more than 500 miles wide , stretching across nearly DT entire western NNP NNPS . NASA has a plan to neutralize supervolcano threats however . PRP believe DT most viable solution MD be to drill up to 6 miles down into DT supervolcano , and pump down NN at high pressure . DT circulating NN MD return at a temperature of around 662 F , thus slowly day by day extracting heat from DT volcano . And while such a project MD come at an estimated cost of around $ 3.46 billion , PRP comes with an enticing catch which MD convince politicians to make DT investment . PRP MD become a source of geothermal NN . But EX are considerable risks , too . PRP MD trigger DT eruption PRP ’s meant to save PRP from . Historically , four types of volcanic events have taken place in Yellowstone ( PRP MD click on each NN to learn more ) : 1 . Caldera Forming Eruptions — 2.1 and 1.3 million NNS ago 2 . Lava Flows — about 30 between 640,000 and 70,000 NNS ago 3 . Earthquakes — 1000 to 3000 yearly ; last notable quake was in 1959 4 . Hydrothermal ( Steam ) Explosions — small explosions in DT 20th century ; a dozen or so major explosions between 14,000 and 3,000 NNS ago DT likelihood of an eruption in DT near future is still low . However those who instigate such a project will never see PRP to completion , or even have an idea whether PRP might be successful within their lifetime . Cooling Yellowstone in this manner MD happen at a rate of 3.2808399 feet a NN , taking of DT order of tens of thousands of NNS until just cold rock was left . But EX are two fatal flaws with this argument : 1 ) PRP were n’t born yesterday ; and 2 ) PRP do n’t come to this page to be lied to . DT NNP Administration ’s cabinet nominees and transition staff are a wall - to - wall collection of zealots , ideologues and latter - day Robber Barons . Their collective message , both stated and implied , is IN DT American NN ’s ability to protect DT environment , already besieged and underfunded , is on DT brink of oblivion . In early December , DT cavalcade of aspirants and celebrities seeking an audience at NNP Tower included two high profile NN activists , former Vice NNP Al Gore and actor Leonardo DiCaprio . In his six NNS on DT job in Oklahoma , Pruitt has enjoyed DT support of keystone local industries , including fossil fuel and poultry . Months away from Exxon ’s mandatory 65 NN - old retirement age , Tillerson was a man in search of a hobby . He ’s an Exxon lifer , with 41 NNS in DT employ of a corporation WDT ’s buried its own NN affirming NN NN , and WDT still funds NN denial groups . But do n’t VB he ’s inexperienced in NN or foreign policy . text: In a " show of force , " DT U.S. Navy dispatched an aircraft carrier and five escort ships to DT South NNP NNP amid rising tensions between DT U.S. , NNP and other Southeast Asian nations claiming territory in DT disputed region , multiple defense officials confirmed to Fox NNP Friday . DT dispatch sends a signal to NNP IN DT U.S. Navy will continue to conduct freedom of navigation patrols even as NNP continues to " militarize " islands , those officials say . DT Navy Times reported Thursday DT U.S. sent DT USS John C. Stennis , two destroyers , two cruisers and DT 7th Fleet flagship . DT deployment comes after Defense Secretary Ash Carter warned NNP over DT militarization of its claimed artificial islands . DT Stennis was joined by DT Japan - based cruisers Antietam and Mobile Bay and destroyers Chung - Hoon and Stockdale , according to DT Navy Times . DT command ship USS Blue Ridge , is RB in DT area and is heading for DT Philippines . Officials VBD DT Antietam was conducting a separate patrol from DT Stennis . Tensions have increased over DT last month after PRP was learned IN NNP had placed surface - to - air - missiles on CD of DT Paracel Islands . Since DT incident , U.S. Pacific Command Chief Adm. Harry Harris has NN IN NNP is militarizing DT region . “ In my opinion NNP is clearly militarizing DT South NNP NNP , ” Harris testified on Feb. 24 . “ PRP ’d have to believe in a flat NNP to believe otherwise . ” DT U.S. has completed patrols within DT 12 - mile limit of NNP ’s artificial islands . Last October , DT destroyer Lassen went through DT region and on Jan. 30 , DT destroyer Curtis Wilbur sailed near Trinton Island , part of DT Paracel Islands . Carter took a harsh tone Tuesday speaking at a conference in San Francisco . He VBD if NNP does n’t heed DT warning to stop militarizing DT region , DT U.S. was prepared to increase military deployments to DT Asia - Pacific region and MD spend nearly $ 425 million to pay for more joint military exercise with NNS WDT feel threatened by Beijing . “ NNP must not pursue militarization in DT South NNP NNP , ” NNP VBD in a speech in San Francisco . “ Specific actions will have specific consequences . ” Meanwhile , a Philippine official VBD he spotted five Chinese coast guard and navy ships at DT Jackson Atoll last week WDT have not been previously stationed RB before . However , by Wednesday DT ships were gone . NNP RB announced Friday PRP will boost defense spending 7 to 8 percent in 2016 , its smallest increase in six NNS . However , PRP will still have DT NN ’s largest standing military in DT NN . DT U.S. and other Southeast Asian governments with rival claims , have expressed alarm over NNP 's island construction , saying PRP raises tensions , threatens regional stability and MD violate freedom of navigation and overflight . Aside from NNP and DT Philippines , Vietnam , Malaysia , Taiwan and Brunei have conflicting territorial claims in DT Spratlys . text: As DT consequences of light pollution have become more visible , lighting regulations have started to evolve . Canada passed bird - friendly lighting ( and construction ) laws in DT mid-1990s , and now numerous cities — including Toronto , Washington , D.C. , and NNP York — participate in lights - out campaigns during peak migration seasons . And in 2016 , DT American NNP Association responded to DT growing body of evidence suggesting IN intense LEDs are harmful to human NN by recommending IN communities VBP streetlights to “ minimize and control blue - rich environmental lighting . ” Entire cities are even re-doing their lights in an attempt to reclaim DT night and decrease NN waste . Flagstaff , Arizona , was DT first city to be designated a Dark Sky Community by DT International Dark - Sky Association , and Chicago is in DT process of retrofitting its fixtures . So far , hesitations about dimmer , sparser lighting causing an uptick in crime or decreased safety at night have not been supported by DT data ; in Chicago ’s West Garfield Park , more brightly lit alleys actually led to an increase in reported crime . And anecdotally , NNS are finding IN less glaring lighting makes PRP easier to see in unlit areas , because our eyes adapt more quickly to DT dark . For some cities , eliminating light pollution is RB a way to increase tourism revenue while strengthening humanity ’s connection to DT night sky . Consider DT town of Jasper , Alberta . Nestled in DT remote Canadian Rockies , Jasper is a haven for those who love DT mountains , wildlife , and DT outdoors . Just a few minutes drive outside town , stargazers can see a dazzling array of nighttime wonders , from oft - hidden stars and satellites to meteorites and DT aurora borealis . Since 2010 , DT city has hosted a Dark Sky Festival in DT fall WDT brings in thousands of NNS . But Jasper residents are n’t content to have DT nighttime wonders visible only just beyond their borders . DT town is now working with Lumican , a Canadian company WDT partners with DT International Dark - Sky Association , to re-do all its streetlights . Slated to start this summer , DT town ’s roughly 400 fixtures will be replaced with shielded Lumican LEDs set to color temperatures ranging between 1,700 and 2,200 Kelvin , which efficiently cast an amber glow while limiting more harmful blue wavelengths . “ What caught our attention at first was how horrible all these JJ LED street lights looked ; so glary , prison - UH , and overly bright , ” says Lumican ’s Lara Mitchell . When she realized IN such street lighting erases stars and damages ecosystems , DT company turned toward fighting light pollution . Throughout North America and Europe , dark sky parks are on DT rise , and festivals IN Jasper ’s are flourishing . NNS are beginning to reconnect with DT sparkling canvas WDT swirls overhead just as technologies are becoming available on scales WDT will help humanity reclaim more of this natural nighttime majesty — if PRP choose to use them . Christopher Kyba , DT scientist who studies light pollution on a JJ level , points to van Gogh ’s “ Cafe Terrace at Night ” as his image of an ideal nighttime scene . “ This is DT dream of what PRP VBP to have — nice , warm , uniform lighting . PRP can see lots of stars up above , DT facades are unlit , ” he says . “ PRP look a hundred - something NNS in DT past to see DT idealized lighting . ”

text: On Reddit , some “ Game of Thrones ” fans subscribe to a tortuous theory WDT a group of old , scholarly men — DT maesters — are part of a sprawling and hidden NN to exert control over DT show ’s mythical kingdom . Just a few clicks away , other Reddit users are sure IN a secretive group — DT Illuminati — is part of a sprawling and hidden NN to control DT real NN . PRP do exactly DT same thing . PRP were once confined to DT far corners of American culture , but in recent NNS have flourished thanks in part to internet message boards and social NN , which offer anyone DT opportunity to publish , debunk , rebunk and remix their own imaginary concepts and share them with RB - minded theorists . DT theories , however , share more than just message boards . Russell Zimmerman , 41 , a writer , game developer and military historian , loves to theorize about “ Game of Thrones , ” particularly DT books on which PRP is based , George R.R. text: Hillary NNP ’s abrupt departure from a Sept. 11 ceremony in NNP York after falling ill Sunday and DT subsequent disclosure IN she is suffering from pneumonia are likely to intensify scrutiny on DT Democratic nominee ’s NN and potentially inject a JJ campaign issue into a race between two of DT oldest candidates ever to seek DT White House . NNP supporters had long dismissed concerns about her NN as baseless , insisting IN she only suffered from allergies . But Sunday ’s incident — along with a video appearing to show NNP having difficulty standing on her own — will only amplify such questions just as DT race enters its final weeks . DT incident RB MD increase pressure on NNP , 68 , and Republican nominee Donald NNP , 70 , to release more information about their NN . NNP has disclosed less than some previous candidates . Donald NNP has released almost nothing . “ This is DT kind of thing WDT voters have a right to understand before PRP cast a vote , ” VBD Katie Packer , a GOP strategist who says she does not support either NNP or NNP . “ Both NNP and Hillary are elderly . PRP are obligated to release full JJ records and full tax returns to DT American NNS . And DT NN , party leaders and American NNS should settle for nothing less . ” DT pneumonia diagnosis comes as DT campaign enters its most grueling phase , weeks before DT first presidential debate and as voters start heading to DT polls in NNS with early voting . Her doctor , who made DT diagnosis Friday , has advised NNP to curtail her schedule . But DT Democratic candidate did not appear to skip any planned events over DT weekend , including a fundraiser in NNP York headlined by Barbra Streisand . After DT incident , NNP ’s campaign VBD late Sunday PRP was canceling a planned trip to California on Monday and Tuesday for fundraisers and a taping of “ DT Ellen DeGeneres Show . ” NNP ’s lung infection comes after a tough week for her campaign , with polls showing a tightening of DT race against NNP . Then over DT weekend , NNP was forced to partially walk back comments she made referring to half of NNP ’s supporters as “ deplorables . ” DT JJ scrutiny of her NN will add to these problems . “ Forty - eight hours ago , this was something for DT Flat NNP Society and DT birth certificate deniers , ” Dan Schnur , director of USC ’s Jesse M. Unruh Institute of Politics , VBD of DT speculation about NNP ’s NN . “ Now PRP ’s a topic of legitimate , mainstream political discussion . ” Although NNP ’s opponents will surely make an issue of her having pneumonia , her campaign ’s relatively quick release of DT diagnosis marked a significant step toward transparency for a candidate who has often shied away from disclosing information she considers private . But some critics complained IN NNP did not reveal DT potentially debilitating condition Friday when PRP was diagnosed . And after she fell ill Sunday morning , her campaign initially attributed PRP to “ overheating ” and waited nearly seven hours — as rumors and speculation about her NN swirled — until disclosing DT pneumonia . For NNP , perhaps DT most damaging part of DT day was DT CD - second video of her struggling to leave DT event in NNP York City . DT video , quickly circulated online and replayed on cable NN channels , shows her standing uneasily , her knees appearing to buckle and needing help to VB into her van . A spokesman VBD immediately afterward IN NNP left DT ceremony at DT site of DT NNP Trade Center about 9:30 a.m. because she felt unwell . NNP spent about two hours at Chelsea NNP ’s apartment and emerged shortly before noon wearing sunglasses , greeting a young girl and waved at diners at a nearby restaurant . “ I ’m feeling great . PRP ’s a beautiful day in NNP York , ” NNP VBD before heading to her home in Chappaqua , N.Y . Her personal physician examined her at her house Sunday afternoon and VBD NNP was recovering . “ While at this morning ’s event , she became overheated and dehydrated . I have just examined her and she is now re-hydrated and recovering nicely , ” VBD Dr. Lisa R. Bardack in a statement . Bardack VBD NNP was put on antibiotics Friday . NNP ’s NN has long been DT speculation of NN theorists . In 2014 , a NNP magazine cover of NNP in her backyard leaning on a chair prompted speculation IN she was leaning on a walker . But innuendo about her NN grew markedly during DT presidential campaign as NNP and his surrogates , including former NNP York City Mayor Rudy Giuliani , routinely questioned her strength and stamina on DT campaign trail . NNP was uncharacteristically silent Sunday after NN of NNP ’s illness emerged . Republicans have RB pointed to coughing fits IN NNP has suffered while campaigning , and which she attributes to seasonal allergies . Her opponents have RB raised questions about DT effect of a concussion she sustained in 2012 . DT drumbeat got to DT point IN NNP poked fun at PRP on late - night television . During an August appearance on “ Jimmy Kimmel Live , ” she pretended to exert great effort as she opened a jar of pickles and asked DT host to check her pulse . NNP dismissed DT attacks as “ wacky ” and noted IN critics have claimed “ I MD be dead in six months , ” she VBD . “ So with every breath I take I feel IN I have a JJ lease on life . ” For DT latest on national and California politics , follow @LATSeema on Twitter .
