text: From warmer temperatures to more extreme weather , melting glaciers and rising NN levels , humanity is fundamentally changing DT NN by pumping greenhouse gases into DT atmosphere , NNP NN NNS VBD on 3 November in their latest assessment of NN NN . DT average JJ temperature has increased by 1 °C since DT start of DT Industrial Revolution , DT 600 - page report says — adding IN DT last 115 NNS comprise “ DT warmest period in DT history of modern civilization ” . DT analysis warns IN temperatures MD increase another 4°C by DT end of DT century , with dramatic consequences for humans and natural ecosystems . DT findings are at odds with DT policies of NNP NNP Donald NNP , who has questioned well - established tenets of NN NN and vowed to protect and promote DT NNP fossil - fuel industry . NNP 's stances led JJ NNS to worry IN his administration MD try to block or tamper with DT NN - NN assessment , but several NNS who helped to write DT document reported no problems . “ PRP were n’t interfered with , and PRP ended up producing something WDT I VBP is of tremendous value , ” says David Fahey , an atmospheric scientist with DT National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration in Boulder , Colorado , and a coordinating lead author of DT analysis . DT NN - NN report is DT first volume of DT fourth National NNP Assessment , a legally mandated analysis of DT causes and impacts of JJ NN WDT is due in 2018 . DT other two parts of DT forthcoming assessment were released today in draft form , for JJ comment . CD analysis focuses on how NN NN is affecting life in DT NNP NNPS , from crop yields to property damage from extreme weather . DT other summarizes DT latest findings on DT JJ carbon cycle . Both of those documents will undergo a formal review by DT NNP National Academy of Sciences . “ DT NN speaks for itself , ” says Don Wuebbles , a a NN scientist at DT University of Illinois at Urbana - Champaign and co-chair of DT NN - NN report . “ PRP ’s hard to counteract DT basic observations and DT truth of DT NN with any kind of political playing around . ” DT trio of documents paints a dramatic picture of how JJ NN is affecting NNS and communities across DT NNP NNPS . Tidal flooding is accelerating in more than 25 coastal cities along DT Atlantic Ocean and Gulf of Mexico . Large forest fires have become more frequent in DT western part of DT country , while warmer spring temperatures and shrinking mountain snowpack are combining to reduce DT amount of NN available to DT region 's cities and farms . As a result , DT draft NN - impacts report warns , “ chronic , long - duration hydrological drought is increasingly possible before DT end of DT century ” . DT report comes just days before DT latest NNP Nations NN talks kick off in Bonn , Germany . PRP will RB be DT first major summit since NNP vowed to pull DT NNP NNPS out of DT 2015 Paris NN pact . Few observers expect NNP NN 's latest set of NN - NN analyses to affect how DT NNP administation approaches NN and environmental issues . In August , DT NNP National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration disbanded an advisory committee WDT was intended to help DT nation prepare for a warmer NN , by translating DT findings of DT coming NN assessment into guidance for cities , NNS and industry . Nor is PRP clear whether senior NNP administration officials will accept DT reports ' core scientific conclusions . As recently as March , NNP Environmental Protection Agency administrator Scott Pruitt VBD he did not believe IN carbon dioxide is major driver of JJ NN . Nonetheless , JJ NNS and environmentalists lauded DT JJ reports for bolstering DT case for more - aggressive action against NN NN . “ DT full assessment , when PRP gets published , is VBG to show IN EX are palpable impacts WDT are VBG to hit every part of DT country , ” says Andrew Light , a senior fellow at DT NNP Resources Institute , an environmental NN - tank in Washington DC . “ PRP ’s DT responsibility of leaders to take note of DT and act accordingly . ”

John Quincy Adams was DT eldest son of NNP John Adams and DT sixth NN of DT NNP NNPS . In his pre-presidential NNS , Adams was CD of America 's greatest diplomats ( formulating , among other things , what became DT Monroe Doctrine ) ; in his post - presidential NNS , he conducted a consistent and often dramatic fight against DT expansion of slavery . Though full of promise , his presidential NNS were difficult . He died in 1848 in Washington , D.C . As a child , Adams witnessed firsthand DT birth of DT nation . From DT family farm , he and his mother watched DT Battle of Bunker Hill in 1775 . At age 10 , he traveled to France with his father , who was securing aid during DT Revolution . By age 14 , Adams was receiving " on - DT - job " training in DT diplomatic corps and VBG to school . During his NN in DT Senate , he supported DT Louisiana Purchase and NNP Thomas Jefferson 's Embargo Act—actions WDT made him very unpopular with other Federalists . In June 1808 , Adams broke with DT Federalists , resigned from his Senate seat and became a Democratic - Republican . Adams returned to DT diplomatic corps in 1809 , when NNP James Madison appointed him DT first officially recognized minister to Russia ( Francis Dana was never officially accepted as a U.S. ambassador by DT Russian NN ) . In 1814 , Adams was recalled from Russia to serve as chief negotiator for DT U.S. NN during DT Treaty of Ghent , settling DT War of 1812 . DT following NN , Adams served as minister to England , a position his father had held 30 NNS earlier . In a post he was most suited for , Adams served as secretary of NN in NNP James Monroe 's administration from 1817 to 1825 . During this NN , he negotiated DT Adams - Onis Treaty , acquiring Florida for DT NNP NNPS . By 1824 , Adams was well - positioned to be DT next NN of DT NNP NNPS . However , DT political NN had changed DT way presidents were elected at DT NN ; only DT Democratic - Republican Party was viable and five candidates emerged , each representing different sections of DT country . Running against Adams were Southerners John C. Calhoun and William Crawford , and Westerners Henry Clay and Andrew Jackson . In addition , by DT 1824 election , 18 of 24 NNS had moved to choose electors to DT Electoral College by popular vote instead of to NN legislatures . In DT Electoral College vote , no CD candidate had a clear majority and , subsequently , DT election was sent to DT House of Representatives . Clay threw his support to Adams , who was elected on DT first ballot . Adams 's victory shocked Jackson , who had won DT popular vote and fully expected to be NN . When Adams later appointed Clay secretary of NN , Jackson Democrats cried " corrupt bargain , " and were enraged at DT seemingly quid pro quo arrangement . Adams entered DT presidency with several debilitating political liabilities . He possessed DT temperament of his father : Aloof , stubborn and ferociously independent in his convictions . As NN , Adams failed to develop DT political relationships needed — even among members of his own party — to effect significant NN . PRP did n't help IN his political opponents were set on making him a CD - term NN . In his first NN in office , Adams proposed several far - sighted programs WDT he felt MD promote NN , as well as encourage a spirit of enterprise and invention in DT NNP NNPS ; these goals included building a network of highways and canals to link DT different sections of DT country , setting aside JJ lands for conservation , surveying DT entire U.S. coast and building astronomical observatories . text: VB breaking NN alerts and special reports . DT NN and stories WDT matter , delivered weekday mornings . More than 100 bushfires are raging in Australia as DT continent swelters under record heat , a double whammy of extremes WDT has amplified scrutiny of what experts say is stark inaction from DT NN on NN NN . Blazes across NNP South Wales and Queensland have scorched almost 7 million acres , and Australia experienced its hottest day on record Wednesday , when DT average temperature across DT country hit 105 degrees . DT nation 's woes are unfolding as Australia faces criticism for what have been described as its inadequate NN policies , including DT role of federal officials in thwarting negotiations at a recent U.N. summit on NN NN . DT summit ended Sunday in a stalemate , with NNS largely delaying major decisions on plans to cut carbon NNS until next NN 's conference . " PRP was terribly disappointing , " Merzian VBD . " Australia is literally on fire right now , and PRP 's clearly linked to NN NN in terms of its severity and duration . But instead of VBG RB to rally DT NN behind DT need for greater NN action , Australia was lobbying to do as little as possible . " Seasonal bushfires occur naturally in Australia , but hotter and drier conditions due to NN NN have increased DT frequency of fires and their severity , VBD Andy Pitman , a NN modeler at DT University of NNP South Wales in Sydney . " EX is an uncontroversial link whereby higher carbon dioxide levels in DT atmosphere from NN NN increase bushfire risk , " Pitman VBD . " All other things being equal , a fire WDT occurs now will be worse than a fire WDT occurred 20 to 30 NNS ago . " Trees play an integral role in DT NN 's carbon cycle by absorbing carbon dioxide as PRP grow . But research has shown IN when vegetation dries out — as during hot and dry summer months — DT increased amount of carbon dioxide acts as extra fuel for wildfires . Human activities , such as burning fossil fuels , release greenhouse gases WDT trap heat and raise surface temperatures . A 2018 NN of DT NN report from DT Australian NN 's Bureau of Meteorology found IN DT country has warmed by just over 1 degree Celsius since 1910 , " leading to an increase in DT frequency of extreme heat events . " Those heat waves , combined with dry conditions , are dangerous ingredients for bushfires , Pitman VBD , with circumstances appearing to be particularly severe at DT moment . " This is unprecedented , " Pitman VBD . " I do n't VB PRP 've ever seen bushfires at this scale before . " Bushfires are RB problematic because PRP release carbon dioxide into DT atmosphere . Australia 's fires are estimated to have emitted 250 million tons of carbon dioxide already — nearly half of DT nation 's total yearly average NNS — according to NASA data provided to DT Guardian . Those events have renewed focus on Australia 's prime minister , Scott Morrison , who has refused to answer questions about NN NN and their link to DT fires . But DT policy was unpopular , and in 2014 , DT newly elected NN repealed DT tax . " PRP was reducing NNS , but PRP just did n't have enough momentum to survive quite a strong negative campaign . Still , he added , PRP 's difficult to be optimistic about DT country 's direction . text: NN NN - what are PRP doing ? DT council adopted a NNP NNP Strategy in April 2014 , which was refreshed in 2017 to bring PRP up to speed with other local and national developments in DT NN NN agenda . PRP included DT adoption of national targets around carbon emission reductions and DT use of renewable NN . DT following three pledges underpin DT work DT council has been doing on NN NN : • To lead by example in reducing its carbon NNS NN on NN . • To help residents , community groups and businesses to reduce their NNS and manage NN risks . • To work with partners to help raise awareness and support initiatives to reduce and mitigate DT impacts of NN NN . PRP are now developing a draft NNP NNP and Air Quality Strategy WDT PRP plan to publish for consultation later in 2020 . This will outline DT steps WDT PRP ’ll be taking to tackle DT issue and reduce our impact on DT environment . DT drive to become a carbon neutral borough by 2030 starts now and PRP have started work to set out DT steps PRP as a council can take and how PRP can work together as a borough . In December 2019 , PRP held a NN NN summit to bring together ideas with partners . View a copy of DT presentation and DT Outcomes Report . Already PRP have : • Installed solar panels on DT roof of several of our council buildings . • Improved DT NN performance of DT council ’s Deanes and Parklands buildings • Set up a group of Environment Champions to promote sustainable practices among staff . • Installed a fresh air cooling system at DT Civic Offices , as well as being environmentally - friendly , DT initiative will generate a saving of £ 9,500 per NN . • Reduced DT distances our bin trucks travel by rebalancing DT rounds , with a monthly carbon saving of 3.8 % per month . With partners , PRP have : • Adopted a transport strategy with a focus on encouraging more sustainable transport including cycling and walking . • Given out loans and grants to improve insulation and install renewable NN sources . • Supported residents to apply for NN funding for NN efficient boilers . PRP are working on our next steps looking at greener ways of delivering council services . Here are just a few of DT projects PRP are working on : • With advice from DT NNP Savings Trust PRP are exploring greater use of electric vehicles . • Updating our Local Plan to ensure tougher standards associated with NN NN and NNS . • Reviewing DT NN efficiency of our accommodation and our staff and councillors ’ travel . • Delivering 3,500 homes at Manydown using DT Garden Towns ’ principle .

text: Does wearing tight pants or underwear IN tighty - whities affect sperm count ? – Carson * Although some studies have shown a decrease in sperm count from wearing tight - fitting underwear , others have not . DT testicles MD seem IN PRP just VBP in DT way sometimes . But DT main reason " DT boys " are on DT outside of DT body is because DT body 's internal temperature of 98.6 °F is too hot for sperm production . text: CD Nation is led by Pauline Hanson , who during DT 1990s was a controversial figure in Australian politics for her views on immigration and Indigenous Australians . His previous writing indicates IN he believes a shadowy cabal of bankers is controlling NN affairs . He says DT NNP Nations is using NN NN to lay DT foundations for an unelected JJ NN . Malcolm Roberts won a Queensland Senate seat as member of DT anti-immigration NNP Nation party in recent elections . Malcolm Roberts believes DT NNP Nations is attempting to create an unelected JJ NN DT party won four seats in Australia ’s Senate during DT election , making PRP DT fourth - largest voting bloc in DT upper house . DT BBC has asked Mr Roberts for an interview and submitted questions to him by email , but has not received a reply . CD Nation leader Pauline Hanson will wield considerable power in Australia ’s Senate But in recent interviews with DT Australian Broadcasting Corp ( ABC ) , Mr Roberts stood by his previous positions . He called for an investigation into Australia ’s Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation ( CSIRO ) over its handling of NN NN NN . When asked if he still believed DT UN was trying to impose a worldwide NN through NN NN policy , Mr Roberts answered : “ Definitely ” . In 2011 , Mr Roberts wrote a letter to then Australian Prime Minister Julia Gillard demanding to be exempted from DT country ’s carbon tax . DT letter , addressed to “ DT Woman , Julia - Eileen : Gillard ” , contained a 28 - point affidavit WDT sought to establish Mr Roberts ’ exemption from DT need to obey DT Australian NN . He referred to himself as “ Malcolm - Ieuan : Roberts . , DT living soul ” , and identified himself as DT “ beneficiary , administrator ” for a corporate entity called MALCOLM IEUAN ROBERTS . DT punctuation and language is consistent with a style of language used by DT so - called sovereign citizen movement , which sees governments as illegitimate and attempts to assert DT rights of individuals to ignore laws and taxes . DT use of unusual grammar and punctuation by sovereign citizens is intended to establish independence from DT NN ’s legal system . A screen grab of DT letter Mr Roberts sent to Ms Gillard , expressing a view IN Australia MD be a NNP corporation However , in a radio interview with DT ABC , Mr Roberts denied IN he was affiliated with DT movement . Mr Roberts RB wrote a report in 2013 entitled CSRIOh ! : NN of Deception , Or First Step to Freedom ? WDT detailed his rejection of man-made JJ NN . “ DT UN IPCC ’s unfounded core claim about human CO2 is part of UN Agenda 21 campaign for JJ governance , ” DT report VBD . In a 135 - page appendix to DT report , Mr Roberts wrote in detail about his belief IN an international cabal of bankers is exercising enormous influence on NN affairs . DT report says DT NNP Federal Reserve and Bank of England are privately controlled corporations , and IN their owners are seeking to introduce carbon trading into DT NN economy as a way to generate money and extend their control . PRP RB lists Holocaust denier and NN theorist Eustace Mullins as a primary reference . Mr Roberts has been criticised in DT past by prominent Australian NN sceptic Andrew Bolt , who VBD his theories on banking families “ smacks too much of DT Jewish NN NN theorising I ’ve always loathed ” . But in DT report Mr Roberts writes IN those who “ falsely smear or imply those raising DT topic [ of DT international banking scam ] as anti-Jewish … is an unfounded furphy [ an untruth ] designed to distract . DT reality is IN international bankers come from a variety of religions . ” Mr Roberts told DT ABC IN his top priorities as a senator were “ accountability ” for DT NN and “ restoring DT constitution ” , relieving cost - of - living pressures , JJ security and security from terrorism .

text: NNS often confuse DT concepts of JJ NN and NN NN , and PRP does n’t help IN NN companies often substitute CD for DT other in TV , newspaper , and social NN reporting . This is somewhat understandable since DT two concepts overlap a great deal . In fact , EX is a causal relationship between DT two . However , EX are some subtle and some not - so - subtle differences between JJ NN and NN NN . DT phrase JJ NN is used by NNS to mean a long - term increase in NNP ’s average air temperature . PRP can refer specifically to such NN WDT is due to DT influence of rising concentrations of greenhouse gases in DT atmosphere . NNP ’s surface gets most of its heat from DT NN associated with DT Sun ’s rays , which strike DT NN ’s surface during DT day . At night most of this NN is radiated back into space . Greenhouse gases ( such as carbon dioxide , methane , nitrous oxides , and chlorofluorocarbons [ CFCs ] ) absorb infrared radiation ( net heat NN ) emitted from NNP ’s surface and radiate PRP back to DT surface , thus contributing to DT greenhouse effect . Though DT recent rise in greenhouse gases in DT atmosphere is arguably DT main factor affecting JJ NN , other factors are involved ( such as variations in NNP ’s orbit , DT angle of DT NN ’s axis , and variations in DT Sun ’s NN output ) . Nevertheless , as higher concentrations of greenhouse gases allow NNP ’s atmosphere to hold on to greater amounts of heat WDT MD normally escape into space at night , NNP ’s average temperature rises . NN NN is a bit different . Before PRP look into what NN NN is , PRP MD be helpful to VB a bit about NN with respect to weather . Weather , which is often confused with NN , is DT set of conditions in DT atmosphere in CD location for a limited period of NN , such as throughout DT day , at night , or at any particular point during DT day . NN , on DT other hand , is DT average condition of DT atmosphere in a given location over a long period of NN , such as 30 NNS or more . Thus , NN NN is a longer - term NN in DT average condition of DT atmosphere . Human beings most certainly contribute to NN NN by adding greenhouse gases to DT atmosphere , but this is only part of DT equation . NNP ’s NN can VB over NN not only because of changes in DT atmosphere but RB because of interactions between DT atmosphere and various geologic , chemical , biological , and geographic factors . For example , regional climates ( as well as NNP ’s JJ NN ) can VB in response to a sustained period of heavy volcanic activity . Much of DT activity is related in turn to DT movement of NNP ’s tectonic plates , which drives DT continents across DT surface of DT NN . Over hundreds of thousands to millions of NNS , DT continents collide with other continents or break apart , changing DT paths of ocean currents and local winds . This affects DT transport of heat from DT tropics to DT poles . NNP ’s JJ NN has RB changed in response to drastic changes in atmospheric chemistry — notably DT rise in oxygen concentrations billions of NNS ago when plants , algae , and other forms of life capable of photosynthesis began to spread across DT NN . As DT NN continues to come to grips with how human activities influence NNP ’s NN , DT tangible effects of NN NN WDT is caused by JJ NN — such as melting glaciers and NN caps , rising NN levels , and changes in seasonal temperature and rainfall patterns — are becoming DT focus . With such disruptions becoming more and more apparent , JJ NNS are discussing them increasingly in terms of real long - term climatic changes rather than simply remarking about NNP ’s average temperature . text: PRP turns out IN DT opposite of dystopia is not utopia , but rather a goofily charming Australian actor armed with a camera and a mission . With his environmental documentary “ 2040 , ” writer - director Damon Gameau set out to create a letter from DT future , a self - described “ exercise in fact - based dreaming , ” for his 4 - NN - old daughter Velvet . Turning to experts in various fields , Gameau learns about solar - powered microgrids , localized economies , electric self - driving cars , urban food farms , regenerative agriculture , marine permaculture , resource awareness and increased educational opportunities for girls ( perhaps DT most surprising element presented ) . Every solution is then dramatized as to how PRP might affect DT NN of a 20 - something Velvet . DT effect is inspiring and empowering . text: How To Discuss “ NN NN ” With A ‘ Woke ’ Teenager After our daughter of fifteen NNS of age was moved to tears by DT speech of Greta Thunberg at DT UN DT other day , she became angry with our generation “ who had been doing nothing for thirty NNS . ” So , PRP decided to help her prevent what DT girl on TV announced of “ massive eradication and DT disappearance of entire ecosystems . ” PRP are now committed to give our daughter a future again , by doing our part to help cool DT NN four degrees . From now on she will VB to school on a bicycle , because driving her by car costs fuel , and fuel puts NNS into DT atmosphere . Of course PRP will be winter soon and then she will VB to VB by bus , but cycling through DT freezing builds resilience . Of course , she is now asking for an electric bicycle , but PRP have shown her DT devastation caused to DT areas of DT NN as a result of mining for DT extraction of Lithium and other minerals used to make batteries for electric bicycles , so she will be pedaling , or walking . Which will not harm her , or DT NN . PRP used to cycle and walk to school too . Since DT girl on TV demanded “ PRP need to VB rid of our dependency on fossil fuels ” and our daughter agreed with her , PRP have disconnected DT heat vent in her room . DT temperature is now dropping to twelve degrees in DT evening , and will drop below freezing in DT winter , PRP have promised to buy her an extra sweater , hat , tights , gloves and a blanket . For DT same reason PRP have decided IN from now on she only takes a cold shower . She will wash her clothes by hand , with a wooden washboard , because DT washing machine is simply a power consumer and since DT dryer uses natural gas , she will hang her clothes on DT clothes line to dry , just IN my parents and grandparents used to do . Speaking of clothes , DT ones WDT she currently has are all synthetic , so made from petroleum . Therefore on Monday , PRP will bring all her designer clothing to DT secondhand shop . PRP have found an eco store where DT only clothing PRP sell is made from undyed and unbleached linen and jute . RB ca n’t have clothes made on wool , because DT NNS from farting sheep are supposedly causing bad weather . PRP should n’t matter IN PRP looks good on her , or IN she is VBG to be laughed at , dressing in colorless , bland clothes and without a wireless bra , but DT is DT price she has to pay for DT benefit of DT NNP . Cotton is out of DT question , as PRP comes from distant lands and pesticides are used for PRP . Very bad for DT environment . PRP just saw on her Instagram IN she ’s pretty angry with PRP . This was not our intention . From now on , at 7 p.m. PRP will turn off DT WiFi and PRP will only switch PRP on again DT next day after dinner for two hours . In this way PRP will save on electricity , so she is not bothered by electro - stress and will be totally isolated from DT outside NN . This way , she can concentrate solely on her homework . At eleven o’clock in DT evening PRP will pull DT breaker to shut DT power off to her room , so she knows IN dark is really dark . DT will save a lot of CO2 . She will no longer be participating in winter sports to ski lodges and resorts , nor will she be VBG on anymore vacations with PRP , because our vacation destinations are practically inaccessible by bicycle . Since our daughter fully agrees with DT girl on TV IN DT CO2 NNS and footprints of her great - grandparents are to blame for ‘ killing our NN ’ , what all this simply means , is IN she RB has to live IN her great - grandparents and PRP never had a holiday , a car or even a bicycle . PRP have n’t talked about DT carbon footprint of food yet . Zero CO2 footprint means no meat , no fish and no poultry , but RB no meat substitutes WDT are based on soy ( after all , WDT grows in farmers fields , WDT use machinery to harvest DT beans , trucks to transport to DT processing plants , where more NN is used , then trucked to DT packaging / canning plants , and trucked once again to DT stores ) and RB no imported food , because DT has a negative ecological effect . And absolutely no chocolate from Africa , no coffee from South America and no tea from Asia . Only homegrown potatoes , vegetables and fruit WDT have been grown in local cold soil , because greenhouses run on boilers , piped in CO2 and artificial light . Apparently , these things are RB bad for DT NNP . PRP will teach her how to grow her own food . Bread is still possible , but butter , milk , cheese and yogurt , cottage cheese and cream come from cows and PRP emit CO2 . No more margarine and no oils will be used for DT frying pan , because DT fat is palm oil from plantations in Borneo where rain forests first grew . No NN cream in DT summer . No soft drinks and no NN drinks , as DT bubbles are CO2 . PRP will RB ban all plastic , because PRP comes from chemical factories . Everything made of steel and aluminum must RB be removed . Have PRP ever seen DT amount of NN a blast furnace consumes or an aluminum smelter ? All bad for DT NN ! PRP will replace her memory foam pillow top mattress , with a jute bag filled with straw , with a horse hair pillow . And finally , she will no longer be using makeup , soap , shampoo , cream , lotion , conditioner , toothpaste and medication . Facewashers will all be linen , IN she can wash by hand , with her wooden washboard , just IN her female ancestors did before NN NN made her angry at PRP for destroying her future . In this way PRP will help her to do her part to prevent mass extinction , NN levels rising and DT disappearance of entire ecosystems . If she truly believes she wants to walk DT talk of DT girl on TV , she will gladly accept and happily embrace her JJ way of life . This article was posted : Wednesday , December 4 , 2019 at 5:24 am

text: BIR SALAH , TUNISIA - Samira Sghaier and a group of friends prune moringa trees under a searing sun , dropping fistfuls of leafy branches into plastic tubs . Prickly acacias edge DT plot of land , protecting bone - dry soil from further erosion . Sghaier ’s father once grew olive and fruit trees — varieties WDT mostly shriveled and died under her watch . “ EX has n’t been enough rain in recent NNS , ” says DT 52 - NN - old farmer . Her tiny farm in eastern Tunisia is a bellwether for DT dramatic environmental changes already reshaping North Africa , which threaten to intensify with NN NN . Sandwiched between an encroaching Sahara and a VBG Mediterranean NNP , DT region has seen a sharp drop in rainfall over DT past half century — a trend experts say will likely intensify in DT coming decades . Indeed , over DT course of this century parts of North Africa as well as DT Middle East might become uninhabitable , according to DT German research and policy organization , DT Max Planck Institute . “ PRP ’re seeing higher temperatures and increasing NN stress , ” says Essia Guezzi , NN and NN project officer for conservation group WWF North Africa , summing up some of DT regional challenges . Meanwhile , rising NN levels threaten DT region ’s largely coastal populations , she and others note . These and other issues will come into sharp focus during next month ’s NN summit in Spain , a fellow member of DT Mediterranean region WDT is considered a NN hotspot — more vulnerable to DT effects of NN NN than other parts of DT NN . While Morocco has earned praise as a NN - NN leader , DT North African region overall needs to do much more to counter an otherwise grim future , experts say . RB hampering efforts : some NNS are buffeted by conflict and civil unrest , while fossil fuels continue to drive Algerian and Libyan economies . Trying to turn DT tide In Tunisia , fresh groundwater reserves are shrinking rapidly . Roughly two - thirds of DT land is threatened by desertification . DT effects of NN NN are likely to slow DT country ’s growth , hitting two major revenue drivers — tourism and agriculture — according to a 2018 report by DT Netherlands Foreign Ministry . While Tunisian authorities have outlined ambitious targets — including cutting NNS 41 percent by 2030 compared to 2010 levels — PRP have been slow to match words with action , critics say . Nor did DT issue figure high on candidates ’ priorities in recent legislative and presidential elections . “ PRP seems IN DT environment and DT impact of NN NN is DT last concern of JJ Tunisian politicians , ” says Hamadi Gharbi , WWF North Africa NNP and NNP project manager , who says DT country RB needs more NN financing and expertise . In DT village of Bir Salah , Sghaier is trying , at least locally , to turn DT tide . She and other area farmers began planting hardy acacia trees to help reduce erosion , along with moringa , a fast - growing plant prized for its nutritional and medicinal properties . DT idea was to help fight NN NN and earn a profit doing so . DT reality has not been so easy . “ Everyone likes JJ products , ” Sghaier says , showing a visitor her storeroom packed with moringa oils and powders , along with bags of moringa - based bsissa , a Tunisian breakfast drink , which a group of growers have made and packaged . “ DT problem is selling them , ” she says . “ PRP ’s hard to find a market . ” Across DT Sahara , DT African Union has spearheaded an ambitious ‘ Great Green Wall ’ initiative aimed to restore degraded land across a swathe of DT Sahel , while RB offering income - generating opportunities for communities living RB . “ DT goal is to replant trees , to return DT Sahel to what PRP was about 60 NNS ago , when EX was a lot more forest cover , ” says anthropologist Gilles Boetsch , director of a French scientific team working with Senegalese researchers in DT region . EX are plenty of setbacks he says . JJ trees die and need to be replaced , while conflict in some Sahel NNS makes areas inaccessible . “ PRP does n’t work 100 percent , but PRP works , ” Boetsch says , adding a similar regional initiative MD RB work north of DT Sahara . “ DT first problem is NN . DT second is getting communities to accept DT projects . ” In North Africa , some national projects to fight NN NN are making a difference , and Tunisia will reportedly present a regional oases protection project at DT Madrid NN conference . Local farmers in northern Algeria are getting Mexican expertise to plant prickly pear , a cactus WDT offers a raft of nutritional and money - generating benefits and needs little rainfall . Algeria is RB trying to revive a massive ‘ Green Dam ’ reforestation project WDT previously had disappointing results . In Tunisia ’s southeastern Gabes region , Dhafer Guezguez worked with DT local NN in European Union - financed projects WDT included restoring oases and reintroduce native date palm species . DT plants are hardy and nutritious , he says , but not as sweet as popular commercial varieties . Attracting consumers will need serious marketing . “ PRP need to be showcased as a product WDT ’s rare and good for PRP , ” Guezguez says . “ DT same kind of effort PRP saw in Europe and DT NNP NNPS to VB NNS to eat organic products . ” DT oases preservation initiatives have helped to boost local economies and restore depleted soil , he says . Women dominate DT workforce . DT projects have continued even after EU financing ended . Participants are RB making tourist handicrafts IN palm leaf bags and hats , to earn extra revenue . “ I VBP this is how , little by little , PRP can save DT oases , ” Guezguez says . “ When local communities realize PRP ’s in their interest to do so .

text: Here PRP see swaddling clothes for DT baby - and a shroud for DT mother . Here PRP see a baby 's cradle connected tragically with a woman 's coffin . Here PRP hear a birth cry and a death gurgle at CD and DT same NN . DT dying mother 's last act was to name her child . " And she named DT child Ichabod . " And her last testimony was - as she thought upon DT ark of God being taken by DT Philistines - " DT glory is departed from Israel . " PRP was goodbye to glory ! " Let PRP make some applications of DT statement , even though PRP MD appear as those who carve epitaphs on tombstones , or as those who write obituaries , or as those who wailingly and discordantly participate in funeral dirges . Though PRP MD be asking PRP to look through old windows upon scenes which others have described , though PRP MD travel some well - worn and familiar trails , though PRP MD serve DT same food in somewhat different platters , still PRP make bold to ask PRP to remember IN ' tis true ' . A Nation NNP Lose Its Glory DT wife of Phinehas , passing through DT swirling waters of DT river of death , VBD : " DT glory is departed from Israel " Thoughtfully scanning DT pages of history , rubbing DT dust of centuries off DT tombs of some nations WDT underwent DT frightful processes of self - burial , PRP can give DT same testimonies concerning other nations . For 'tis true IN , warmed by DT sun which never loses its glory , a nation 's sun MD set in night . Under DT stars - stars which never lose their splendor a nation 's starry crown MD lose its brightness , being displaced by a withered wreath of poison ivy or a circle of undesirable cactus , or by DT brow becoming an eyeless , earless , tongueless , brainless skull . Beneath DT heavens which declare DT glory of God , even as DT firmament showeth His handiwork , a nation WDT circled DT clouds as a strong - winged eagle , can flutter among DT clouds as a broken - winged vulture or squawking parrot . Among DT flowery continents of God a nation can become a place of foul odours WDT make DT righteous stop their noses . [ Ancient Babylon ] Great was DT glory of Babylon of old ; but Babylon became a vermin- infested , animal - prowling jungle - Babylon , " DT glory of kingdoms , DT beauty of DT Chaldees ' excellency , " became " as when God overthrew Sodom and Gomorrah . " Something of DT tragic departure of its glory is told in these words : " PRP shall never be inhabited , neither shall PRP be dwelt in from generation to generation : neither shall DT Arabian pitch tent RB ; neither shall DT shepherds make their fold RB . But wild beasts of DT desert shall lie RB ; and their houses shall he full of doleful creatures ; and owls shall dwell RB , and satyrs shall dance RB . And DT wild beasts of DT islands shall cry in their desolate houses and dragons in their pleasant palaces : and her NN is near to come , and her days shall not be prolonged . " - Isaiah 13:20 - 22 . [ Ancient Carthage ] Great was DT glory of Carthage centuries ago . But her commanders became as impotent as skeletons of cattle scattered on desert sands . Her swift feet became as a cripple 's walk - her clenched fist as DT fumbling fingers of a paralytic . [ Ancient Syria ] Wondrous DT glory of Syria at a NN when Eleanor 's troubadours at Antioch bewitched DT Syrian air with ballads of DT South - and lightened DT horrors of DT second crusade . But Syria 's glory departed when DT following was VBN . " But this NNS hath a revolting and a rebellious heart ; PRP are revolted and gone . " - Jeremiah 5:23 . [ Ancient Greece ] Great was DT glory of ancient Greece - especially from 450 B.C. to 350 B.C. - under Pericles . But Greece became a moulded crust in history 's garbage heap . Greece had her Athens -- civilization 's queen . Plato was hers . Socrates was hers . A vast multitude of seers was hers . Phidias , raising beautiful NNS unto Athens from DT sterile womb of stone , marbled JJ places with sculptured wonders . DT Muses tented in her gates and plumed DT arts with eagle 's wings . At JJ shrines DT human brain bowed in reverence . But with all these persons , with all these things of beauty , Greece became a moulded crust in history 's garbage can . [ Ancient Rome ] Great DT glory of DT Rome of centuries far back and forever gone - especially from 50 B.C. to 60 A.D. - with her astute statesmen , with her close - meshed code of laws , with her sword - woven mantle , coin - embroidered , WDT fell on cities where merchants congregated and fattened on DT spoils of trade , with her armies WDT feasted and fattened on blood . Rome was mighty among DT kingdoms - mighty wherever ships and swords and thrones and lust of gold and sovereignty constituted DT boasted heritage of DT age . But Rome and her glory became as a mouth full of pyorrheic gums holding rotten teeth , all loose and foul . [ Ancient Nineveh ] Great DT glory of DT nation - JJ realm of Nineveh - with her winged lions symbolic of strength and speed . But Nineveh became as a vari-colored butterfly enmeshed and perishing in DT net of a relentless spider . [ Ancient Egypt ] Great DT glory of old ancient Egypt - DT land of DT Pharaohs - DT land of wealth and wonders . But PRP became a shabby sexton of splendid tombs - her torch of far - reaching splendor became a pot of smoke without CD spark of remaining radiance . [ Ancient Spain ] Great was DT glory of ancient Spain - back RB in DT glorious NNS beyond recall . Wide and strong was DT sway of her scepter . Her piratical ships harassed all DT seas and filled her coffers with gold . But this nation , with NN and conquests and caches of coin , with thrones and crowns and scepters , with laughter and love and lure , with men and money and might , with fervor and force and fruit , became as a drowsy and lousy and frowsy beggar watching a broken clock . [ Ancient Jerusalem ] And let PRP ask PRP to VB of Jerusalem - " beautiful for situation " - as representative of DT nation Israel . Triumphant were her temples . Her past " shines glorious as doth DT moon on midnight seas . " For favoured Jerusalem , kings kneeled down and prayed . For glorious Jerusalem , prophets , in tears and love , served . For beautiful Jerusalem , martyrs shriveled into flame . In Jerusalem 's virgin face were eyes in which , deep - folded , lay prophecies of DT Son of God . But because within her sacred courts evil was girt with diadem , Jerusalem hardened her heart . Jerusalem bloodied her hands . Jerusalem deafened her ears . Jerusalem played DT harlot . And Jesus described her then departing and afterward utterly departed glory in these words , " Thy house is left unto thee desolate . " Covered this blood - soaked NN with DT wreck of once - glorious cities . Scarred DT face of this war - blighted NN with DT ruin of once - glorious nations . Marred DT fair face of this NN with DT wreck of once - glorious civilizations - civilizations which have left behind them nothing but DT smoke of DT brilliant torch , nothing more than an empty name , nothing more than DT shadow of a shadow . What DT Bible says about some nations and some cities - representatives in large measure of once - proud , once - strong , once - influential civilizations - is true of other nations and cities of DT past and DT present : " For I have sworn by myself , saith DT Lord , IN Bozrah shall become a desolation , a reproach , a waste , and a curse ; and all DT cities thereof shall be perpetual wastes ... " RB Edom shall be a desolation . every CD WDT goeth by PRP shall be astonished , and shall hiss at all DT plagues thereof ... " And Hazor shall be a dwelling for dragons , and a desolation for ever ; EX shall no man abide RB , nor any son of man dwell in PRP . "- Jeremiah 49:13,17,33 . " This is DT rejoicing city WDT dwelt carelessly , DT VBD in her heart , I am , and EX is none beside me : how is she become a desolation , a place for beasts to lie down in ! every CD DT passeth by her shall hiss , and wag his hand . " - Zephaniah 2:15 . In America PRP must remember IN DT glory of a nation is righteousness and faith in God - and VBG DT way God points - and in such is our security against all foes , our immunity against DT ravages of NN . " For DT nation and kingdom WDT will not serve thee shall perish , yea , those nations shall be utterly wasted . " - Isaiah 60:12 . This sober truth WDT only righteousness exalteth a nation -- IN if ever America loses her faith in God she will have to come off her pedestal , IN pallbearers WDT carried other nations to their graves will do work for PRP if PRP forsake God and refuse to VB DT way He points -- was put upon our hearts once by DT editor of DT Watchman - Examiner in these words : " PRP should remember IN CD hundred NNS ago Germany was regarded as DT most Christian nation in Europe . Then came a day when innate conceit got to work . Christianity was emasculated . Christ was rationalized to be nothing more than a good man . DT Holy Scriptures were reduced to a crazy quilt . Religion came to be built on negatives . God was dwarfed and man was deified . ' Let DT strong survive , ' became DT JJ religion . Germany was decivilized and Hitler had no trouble getting his followers to arm to DT hilt to conquer DT NN . " Let PRP ask DT help of Almighty God in these days when men " loose wild tongues WDT hold not God in awe , " when EX are evils WDT MD lead our greatest graces to DT grave and leave DT NN no copy . When DT atheistic deformities of our times MD coerce PRP into substituting for Christianity 's vital bread a chunk of froth scattered by miasmatic winds - lest our country become a despised Ichabod among DT nations of NN . A Church NNP Lose Her Glory " Thy glory hath departed " Too bad and too sad when DT is spoken of a church about which glorious things once were spoken . ' Tis tragic , 'tis true IN of some churches such is DT epitaphic description of their decay , their inverted torch , their oil - less lamps , their turning back in DT day of battle - though armed and carrying bows . DT is grief for angels . DT is laughter for devils . DT is gloating for Satan . DT is groaning for Christ 's followers . A church can " leave its first love " DT church at Ephesus did - and needed to " repent and do DT first works " Revelation 2:4,5 . A church can VB from an army into an ecclesiastical nursery wherein DT preacher is looked upon as a head nurse who has more to do with milk bottles for sickly saints than with mighty battles against seductive Satan . Then does its glory depart . A church can VB from a church of compassionate concern into a church of callisthenic conventionality utterly devoid of devotional vitality - censorious of spiritual and far - sighted leadership , worldly , wayward , and peevishly puny . Then can Ichabod be written over its portals , its pews , its pulpit . A church can VB from a cataract of activity into a scum - covered pond of stagnation . Thus , forgetting IN " she IN liveth in pleasure is dead while she liveth , " she hastens DT departure of her glory . A church can VB from a church of aggressive conquest into a church possessive of a slothful timidity , a passive acquiescence in small attainments , a criminal spineless in DT face of evils WDT arrogantly challenge , a careless in - difference to great stretches of DT unattained . Thus is Ichabod an appropriate adjective for its activities and aimlessness . A church can be a roller of marbles when PRP should be a remover of mountains . Thus does its spiritual muscle become flabby , its fingers fumbling , its feet halt - as DT glory departs . A church can put its headlight on DT rear and VB only of DT glory WDT was . Then and thus does its light grow dim , its voice faltering , its spiritual ambitions anemic , its worship boresomely lacking in life , its glory NN of DT past . Pathetic DT words WDT fell from DT Master 's lips . " And as he went out of DT temple , CD of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here ! And Jesus answering VBD unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? EX shall not be left CD stone upon another , WDT shall not be thrown down " Mark 13:1,2 . PRP were great buildings . PRP were magnificent stones . But to his eyes PRP were nothing more than ruins , for DT glory of DT temple 's worship and service had departed . " But DT Lord VBD unto Samuel , Look not on his countenance , or on DT height of his stature ; because I have refused him : for DT Lord seeth not as man seeth ; for man looketh on DT outward appearance , but DT Lord looketh on DT heart " - I Sam . 16:7 . Outwardly DT beautiful and stately temple seemed destined to " defy DT tooth of NN . " Inwardly PRP was hollow and empty and tottering to its fall . Write " Ichabod " upon PRP . Is PRP possible for a church , when God calls PRP to " launch out into DT deep " in DT matter of soul - winning , to become " a drifting sepulcher manned by a frozen crew ? " Well , when academic luster takes DT place of spiritual passion , when refrigeration is valued above conflagration , such is DT danger . I once heard Dr. Perry Webb say : " DT atmosphere in some churches is so cold , PRP can skate down DT aisles . " Is PRP true IN a church MD be noted for DT gorgeous architecture of its building , DT lovely music of its choir , DT stateliness of its ritual , DT fine - functioning of all its organizations , DT largeness of numbers as to its congregation , DT influence in JJ circles of business and social and educational life - and yet be , in DT eyes of Him who marks DT sparrow 's fall , as a corpse wrapped in an ornate shroud ? Of DT church at Sardis , Jesus , risen and enthroned , VBD : " And unto DT angel of DT church in Sardis write , These things saith he WDT hath DT seven Spirits of God , and DT seven stars ; I VBP thy works , IN thou hast a name WDT thou livest , and art dead . " - Revelation 3:1 . Somebody described another church IN unto DT church at Sardis in these words : Outwardly splendid as of old - Inwardly sparkless , void and cold - Her force and fire all spent and gone - IN DT dead moon she still shines on . R.T. Ketcham once VBD : " Attend church , but do not attend a church which prefers NN to Scripture , reason for revelation , theories for truth , culture for conversion , benevolence for blood , goodness for grace , sociability for spirituality , play for praise , pep for prayer , profession for possession , progress for power , reformation for regeneration , good for God , speculation for salvation , jubilation for justification , feelings for faith , paralysis for peace , politics for precepts . " To this I make additional comment saying IN a church deserves to have Ichabod written from its lowest cellar step to DT sky - touching point of its steeple which prefers DT adulation of saints to ardent anxieties concerning lost sinners as well as abhorrence of DT which is evil . Today so JJ homes die in houses . Today JJ who VBP better , living for things WDT matter least , neglecting things WDT matter most , are content with houses in which EX are no homes . text: After NNS of deflection and foot - dragging , DT major tech companies are finally having to take steps toward policing their own content . PRP have reached this point kicking and screaming , under great JJ pressure , after clinging for NNS to DT fiction WDT PRP are just JJ utilities and IN NNS can use their pipes for pretty much anything . But now PRP have VBN , for a brief moment at least , against a major NN theorist . Facebook , Apple , YouTube and Spotify have all taken action against Alex Jones . PRP are deathly afraid of being accused of political bias , sometimes for good reason . Both Facebook and Twitter have both grappled with incidents of discrimination against conservatives , which MD have made them gun-shy about banning ( as opposed to shadow - banning ) some folks . But almost in unison , DT tech giants teamed up against Jones , who runs Infowars . Candidate Donald NNP appeared on Jones ' online show in 2015 , and yesterday Jones tweeted a video defense with DT headline : " EMERGENCY : NNP NNP Must Defend DT First Amendment . " Facebook VBD PRP has taken down some Jones pages " for glorifying violence , which violates our graphic violence policy , and using dehumanizing language to describe NNS who are transgender , Muslims and immigrants , which violates our hate speech policies . " Apple VBD PRP removed DT " Alex Jones Show " and other podcasts from iTunes and its podcast app . DT company VBD PRP " does not tolerate hate speech , and PRP have clear guidelines WDT creators and developers must follow to ensure PRP provide a safe environment for all of our users . " Google ’s YouTube dropped DT ax on Jones ' channel , telling DT Washington Post IN PRP terminates users who violate " our policies against hate speech and harassment or our terms prohibiting circumvention of our enforcement measures . " And Spotify banned Jones altogether after earlier removing some podcasts , telling DT Post : " PRP take reports of hate content seriously and review any podcast episode or song WDT is flagged by our community . " I VBP Jones has a lot of fans — remember DT controversy swirling around his interview with Megyn Kelly — but he's RB a guy being sued by Sandy Hook parents for saying IN DT horrible massacre at DT Connecticut school was a hoax . Jones apologized last NN , in careful language , for spreading DT phony Pizzagate NN theory , saying he'd been given inaccurate information . DT ’s not " conservative . " DT 's at odds with reality . Jones texted DT Post WDT being banned by DT tech companies was " a counter - strike against DT JJ awakening . " " PRP 've seen a giant yellow journalism campaign with thousands and thousands of articles for weeks , for months misrepresenting what I 've VBN and done to set DT precedent to de-platform me before Big Tech and DT Democratic Party as well as some Republican establishment types move against DT First Amendment in this country as PRP VBP PRP , " he VBD . Separately , Jones called DT NNP York Times a " globalist intelligence agency " and VBD IN DT " evil , wicked sociopaths " who work for major NN outlets were teaming up to take down Infowars . I confess I 'd VB to VB how DT four tech companies happened to take action on DT same day . Perhaps PRP concluded EX was safety in numbers . PRP seemed to have an ally in Drudge , whose banner headline was " APPLE REGULATES HATE . " But this is just a skirmish . Just recently , Mark Zuckerberg got himself into trouble by saying he saw no reason to ban pages by Holocaust deniers . EX is a fine line between banning hate and bullying on CD hand and censoring controversial political opinions on DT other . These battles will play out in a hyperpartisan political atmosphere . But for now , Apple , Facebook , Google and Spotify have all agreed EX is CD person who falls on DT wrong side of DT line .

text: This article is more than 3 NNS old . Bullshit , James Ball tells me , can VB PRP into DT Oval Office . DT former Guardian journalist and now special correspondent at BuzzFeed is well versed in separating fact from fiction . As a young reporter fresh out of university he started as an intern at WikiLeaks , working on DT verification and publication of confidential NNP documents in 2010 , and then on DT Snowden leaks in 2013 during his NN at DT Guardian . DT ’s all to say he ’s developed a sixth sense for what is , and is n’t , bullshit . With this in mind , today Ball is publishing his debut book as a solo author on DT fake NN phenomenon which has engulfed DT NN of politics over DT last NN . PRP sat down with Ball to find out how half - truths , untruths and outright fakery took over : Fake NN , post - truths and bullshit , is this a JJ phenomenon ? This definitely is n't JJ : newspapers have run questionable stories for as long as PRP 've existed , and fake NN has circulated DT web for just as long . But things have changed a bit – fake NN got political last NN , because DT was DT way to VB huge audiences . So PRP 's some old trends WDT have suddenly really come to DT fore . So who 's to blame for fake NN ? Russia ! More seriously – all of PRP . Fake NN is just DT most visible bit of what is a whole ecosystem of half - truths , untruths and outright fakery , or in other words , of bullshit . When PRP share a story without thinking about PRP or checking , PRP 're part of DT system . When a hyper - partisan NN site ( VB Breitbart or DT Canary ) over - hypes and spins a kernel of truth into something much bigger , DT 's part of PRP . When mainstream outlets run too - good - to - check stories , PRP 're part of PRP . And when Facebook and others profit off this whole system , PRP 're part of PRP too . Are EX examples of fake NN causing real harm ? DT Pizzagate NN – an alt - right theory IN pizza parlours were harbouring secret child abuse sites used by leading democrats – led to an armed man storming a DC pizza parlour . So DT consequences of this stuff can be very real . Polling shows Republicans believe Obama wiretapped NNP ( EX 's no evidence he did ) , while JJ Democrats believe NNP election machines themselves were hacked ( EX 's no evidence of this either ) . When PRP all believe different facts , PRP can't have a JJ conversation – PRP can only have a shouting match . So what 's DT solution ? Will PRP ever be free of fake NN ? DT upside of all of PRP being part of DT problem is IN PRP can all be part of DT solution . PRP need to find ways to make corrections reach as JJ NNS as DT initial bad reports and hoaxes do . PRP 've got to find JJ ways to cover politicians and campaigns which deploy bullshit to win . EX 's no CD big fix , but EX 's lots of little things all of PRP can do . DT fightback can start whenever PRP VBP . Post - Truth : How Bullshit Conquered DT NNP is available now on Kindle and in paperback . This article originally appeared on DT Memo

text: I am republishing this post from July 27 , 2010 in view of Pizzagate , which gives this post a JJ significance . text: Picture adult engagement with information as a continuum . On CD side sits intentional ( or actively sought ) information , and on DT other lives seemingly incidental ( or passively received ) information ( see Figure 1 ) . In this section , PRP address DT two ends of this continuum and then discuss DT space in between . Our continuum is based entirely on work in schools and with teachers ; however , a reviewer of earlier drafts of this article pointed PRP to Ross 's ( 1999 ) concept of finding without seeking , which led PRP to Williamson 's ( 1998 ) article , which distinguished incidental information acquisition from purposeful information seeking . These older studies serve to remind PRP IN DT concepts employed here are not JJ , although DT ubiquity , speed , and scale of information encountered in DT age of DT internet is . Educators need to address these challenges , but where are PRP to begin ? As part of DT SHEG ( 2016 ) NN , DT researchers compared DT way students approached judging credibility with DT way professional fact ‐checkers approached DT same tasks ( Wineburg & McGrew , 2016 ) . This is an interesting and important line of research , partly because PRP compares various kinds of readers and reading purposes and partly because PRP grows from an authentic example of adult interaction with text . PRP RB see value in exploring DT relation between identity and information seeking ( Kohnen , in press ) and wonder how schools might design learning environments where students not only learn fact ‐checking skills but RB learn to value facts . DT utility of DT rules for internet searching WDT are currently and commonly taught is suspect given DT range of topics likely addressed in DT upper left quadrant of Figure 2 . When querying settled issues WDT are uncontroversial , DT rules MD make some sense . However , DT issues WDT fall into DT upper left quadrant are often those WDT are most controversial or otherwise unsettled . DT more current DT question is , DT less likely NN is to find peer ‐reviewed research on PRP ; library NNS have described this as DT information cycle . Navigating DT digital floodwaters is perhaps most treacherous when users are in unsettled territory , but if educators are to prepare students for authentic , intentional searching , is n't PRP their responsibility to help students gather information about unsettled topics ? DT high ‐stakes searches should be a high priority for schools , but DT small amount of information ‐seeking instruction currently occurring appears to be almost exclusively focused on preparing students for searches WDT fall into DT upper right quadrant of Figure 2 . Clearly , students should be exposed to what PRP means to search IN an expert and should learn to use specific websites WDT historians , NNS , literary critics , or mathematicians find highly credible . Yet , should this be DT only kind of information ‐seeking instruction WDT students receive ? After all , DT upper left quadrant of Figure 2 ( “ highly important / low preparation ” ) is a place where PRP will all find ourselves at CD point or another in our lives . Questions related to citizenship , personal finance , NN , and consumer decisions MD all fall into this quadrant . Again , based on surveys and conversations with adults of all ages , PRP conclude IN most NNS engage in intentional information seeking of all kinds at CD point or another . Examples from Angela 's perspective are included in Figure 2 for illustrative purposes , and PRP have invited dozens of adults to VB about their recent information ‐seeking endeavors in these terms . PRP hope IN this graphic will help start a conversation about what PRP means to prepare students to be successful in different kinds of searches . In all likelihood , educators will see DT low ‐stakes searches as a low priority for schools ; perhaps teachers might model via a search ‐aloud ( Saul , Kohnen , Newman , & Pearce , 2012 ) how PRP engage in low ‐stakes searches of different kinds , but otherwise these kinds of searches probably demand little curricular space . However , DT internet ‐searching rules imposed by JJ teachers do little to prepare students for DT daily information needs of adults , needs WDT are not primarily academic or even career in nature . In fact , DT banned resources are DT bedrock of JJ of DT searches WDT adults engage in as parents , moviegoers , hobbyists , and so forth ( for more on Wikipedia , see Alvermann , 2017 ) . PRP propose thinking about these needs in terms of two variables : importance ( Is DT information need high or low stakes ? ) and preparation ( How well has your education and / or experience prepared PRP to deal with DT information PRP find ? ; see Figure 2 ) . Searches undertaken in schools appear to be designed to help students succeed in formal academic environments . If DT goal of schools is to prepare students to succeed as academics in training , PRP might make sense to ban Wikipedia ; after all , academics do not usually cite tertiary sources such as Wikipedia in their formal writing . Likewise , perhaps teachers privilege .gov and .edu domain names because PRP associate these domains with an editorial process , and some teachers MD encourage students to VB to DT databases in an attempt to steer them toward peer ‐reviewed resources . PRP appears IN most teachers recognize how difficult navigating DT digital floodwaters is for students and believe IN rules are needed as basic signposts or clues . Yet , these rules do not teach students to assess DT credibility of online information as a nuanced or critical thinking activity . Instead , these inflexible rules mask differences between websites WDT MD have a similar domain name or DT same suffix ; do not account for DT various kinds of information WDT exist online ( e.g. , blogs , newspapers , magazines , commercial product sites , professional and amateur videos ) ; and privilege academic searches over other kinds of information seeking , as PRP discuss next . Since 2009 , PRP have been collecting survey , focus group , and interview data on DT ways WDT students are being taught to access information online . PRP have RB talked informally with teachers as part of other projects WDT take PRP into schools . Our respondents came from urban , suburban , and rural upper elementary , middle , and high school classrooms ( grades 4 – 12 ) in schools in DT U.S. Midwest and Southeast . PRP RB discussed internet searching with a group of college students at a highly selective university ( see Kohnen & Saul , 2017 ) . Based on several hundred responses , DT following trends became apparent : Compounding DT problem , high ‐stakes tests , including NN tests such as those developed by Smarter Balanced and DT Partnership for Assessment of Readiness for College and Careers , as well as college entrance exams such as DT SAT and ACT , do not currently demand IN students find their own information . Rather , tests are scored on students ' ability to read provided texts and cite relevant details from those texts in a coherent essay WDT answers someone else 's question . In this environment , PRP have even heard principals characterize student curiosity as a potential distraction WDT must be managed . In sum , DT answer to DT question about whether DT curriculum allots space and NN for students ' own queries and curiosities is often no or at least not enough . Since DT Common Core NNP Standards ( National Governors Association Center for Best Practices & Council of Chief NNP School Officers , 2010 ) were unveiled , schools across DT NNP NNPS have devoted more NN to informational and other kinds of nonfiction texts ( see RB DT National Assessment of Educational Progress frameworks , on which DT Common Core 's reading and writing distributions were based ) . However , as noted earlier , these texts are typically teacher selected or curriculum dictated , with little input or effort on DT part of students . Surely , teaching students to read and engage with complex nonfiction is a challenging task , and working with class texts MD be a necessary or effective way to introduce certain skills or engage in whole ‐group discussions . Yet , without NN and space to explore their own questions and curiosities , students have little chance to practice their intentional information ‐seeking skills in personal and motivating contexts . Understandably , teachers express worry IN DT curriculum is already too crowded ; DT unpredictability of student ‐driven information seeking MD feel , in CD teacher 's words , “ just too hard . ” As this list makes clear , DT information sought MD be serious or trivial , uncontested or complex . Because intentional information acquisition implies action ( from finding directions to choosing a diet plan to deciding how to vote ) , PRP RB involves skills : DT skills to seek , find , assess , and comprehend a wide variety of texts ( often in a variety of modalities ) . Curriculum developers have deemed some information important and purposefully ignored other informational needs . For instance , few teachers teach or grade a young person 's ability to follow a baseball team 's efforts , even though PRP MD recognize this effort as useful , engaging , and perhaps even wholesome . At DT other end of DT information –acquisition continuum sits incidental information , DT information WDT PRP are all exposed to on a near ‐constant basis . DT term incidental seems to imply IN information is simply sprayed about and hits some of PRP . This is , to a limited extent , DT case : An airport blasts PRP with television NN , and a YouTube video is available only if CD first watches an advertisement . Other forms of incidental information are targeted based on who PRP is ( e.g. , DT targeted ads and articles WDT pop up on our computer screens ) , where CD lives , or what PRP does . Regardless of why this non‐sought ‐out information comes to PRP , DT amount of incidental information WDT PRP encounter is astounding , as recent studies have estimated ( see Bohn & Short , 2012 ; Short , 2013 ) . Schools have historically sought to ignore incidental information , despite DT fact IN PRP composes a huge proportion of DT information diet . Yet , to bring incidental information and ideas thoughtfully into DT curriculum , educators need to recognize first IN incidental information is , in fact , a fund of knowledge . Until incidental information is recognized as such , educators will not be able to analyze its sources , its effects , or its role in students ' lives . JJ scholars have discussed DT disconnect between home and school literacies , particularly for students whose home cultures do not align with DT culture represented by their school ( e.g. , Heath , 1983 ; Moje , Ciechanowski , & Kramer , 2004 ) . In this same sense , PRP is important to note IN incidental information should be considered a literacy WDT MD or MD not align with school discourse . Imagine DT information WDT students are exposed to as part of their everyday , out ‐of ‐school lives through no seemingly active effort on their part : television and radio programs ; websites WDT happen to be up on a computer or tablet when a student sits down to play or work with PRP ; physical copies of magazines , newspapers , and books in DT home ; and automatic texts or RSS feeds WDT appear on a phone or in an e‐mail inbox . These sources often RB inspire adult conversations WDT students MD join or simply overhear . More important perhaps is DT information picked up in dinnertime conversations or on outings with family members or friends . DT sheer amount of incidental information WDT students are exposed to outside of school MD be a critical component of school success . In studies WDT focused on physical resources , Neuman and Celano ( 2001 ) and Neuman and Moland ( 2016 ) found socioeconomic differences in access to print for very young NNS , with NNS in low ‐income neighborhoods having fewer print resources available . Neuman and Moland coined DT term book deserts to describe DT lack of physical books in areas of concentrated poverty . PRP suspect IN EX MD be similar differences in DT amount of incidental information WDT students are exposed to outside of schools and , surely , differences in DT types and sources of such information , such as DT kinds of books , magazines , and newspapers in DT home ; access to high ‐speed internet and DT technologies to take advantage of PRP ; and adult conversations around incidental information . In other words , experiences with incidental information often help students do better ( or worse ) in schools . DT issue here is CD of alignment . Although DT amount and content of incidental information WDT young NNS are exposed to MD differ across socioeconomic classes , a proposition WDT PRP have not investigated , all residents living in DT NNP NNPS in DT 21st century are exposed to a great deal of incidental information . Yet , when incidental information aligns nicely with DT discourses of school , DT bar for learning JJ information in school is relatively low . However , when DT incidental information to which students are exposed ( perhaps because of class , culture , neighborhood , or other reasons ) is quite different from or at odds with school discourses , DT bar for school success is much higher . VBN differently , experiences with incidental information likely make school harder or easier for students . In contrast to a deficit model of thinking , Moll and colleagues ( e.g. , Moll , 2015 ; Moll , Amanti , Neff , & Gonzalez , 1992 ) focused on resource ‐based pedagogy , a way of teaching WDT builds on what students , families , and communities VBP ( i.e. , their funds of knowledge ) . Inspired by Moll , PRP ask , How might incidental information be considered a fund of knowledge ? How might teachers learn what incidental information makes up DT backdrop of their students ' lives and use this information as a resource for teaching ? From a student perspective and by our own definition of non‐sought ‐out knowledge , DT school curriculum often , if not always , focuses on incidental information . DT curriculum is typically determined by someone else and is presented to students with very little , if any , input on their part . Even when students are in classrooms WDT promote active learning , DT activity is almost always focused on learning predetermined concepts about predetermined topics ; as noted earlier , in JJ schools , very little NN is dedicated to students ' own curiosities and queries . However , CD of DT gifts of an exceptional teacher is DT ability to inspire students to move from passive information acquisition to active , intentional information seeking , often about topics WDT DT students never considered before . Curricular units almost always start with students in a passive role in terms of topic , concept , or information to be learned ; DT is , although PRP MD be engaged in active learning , PRP usually have not selected DT curriculum itself . Yet , through DT guidance of a teacher , students can take an active interest in finding out more . For example , Wendy ( second author ) recently witnessed an upper elementary NN teacher teaching a unit on animals native to DT NN . Inspired by their teacher 's enthusiasm , students eagerly researched a bird and wrote individual entries for a class book on “ what makes native birds cool . ” PRP doubt IN JJ of DT students in this class MD have chosen to seek out bird information on their own prior to their teacher 's invitation , but PRP found her enthusiasm and deep interest in their research irresistible . PRP suggest IN our continuum of information acquisition MD be useful for teachers as PRP VBP about DT curriculum from DT perspective of their students . Engaging students in active learning is not a JJ concept , of course , but DT intentional end of DT continuum is specifically about active seeking , not just activity in terms of classroom talk or movement . Our respect and even love for education was built on DT efforts of influential teachers who inspired PRP to VB to VB more about a topic previously viewed as foreign and perhaps even boring . Although such engagement likely cannot happen for every student during every unit , including more opportunities for active , intentional information seeking on curricular topics is a reasonable goal . Finally , PRP wonder how schools can equip students to recognize and respond appropriately when incidental information is a distraction . Today , adults and NNS alike struggle to manage DT onslaught of incidental information . Incidental information , in DT form of background radio or television programs or DT constant influx of e‐mail and text messages , is ubiquitous . Images of couples staring at screens rather than making conversation and parents pushing NNS on swings while checking their phones have become cliché , but PRP RB represent a frightening reality . Our students today live with a 24 ‐ hour NN cycle WDT must manufacture NN to fill airtime ; JJ RB believe in DT myth of multitasking and attempt to do homework while clicking back and forth among multiple information feeds . Learning to shut down or limit DT flow of incidental information , or at least judge when PRP is worthy of attention , MD be an overlooked 21st ‐century literacy skill .

text: U.S. NNP - elect Donald NNP returned Tuesday to his vision of a non-interventionist foreign policy for DT NNP NNPS , saying , as he did during his campaign , IN he does not VB American forces fighting " in areas WDT PRP should n't be fighting in . " At a " thank PRP " rally for his supporters in Fayetteville , North Carolina , NNP VBD his focus instead will be on defeating terrorists , including DT Islamic NNP group . " PRP will stop racing to topple foreign regimes WDT PRP VBP nothing about , IN PRP should n't be involved with , " NNP VBD , insisting DT NNP NNPS must end a " destructive cycle of intervention and chaos . " Fayetteville neighbors DT U.S. Army 's Fort Bragg , DT NN 's largest military base , as well as DT U.S. Air Force 's Pope Field . Eight military installations dot DT NN . NNP pledged to build up DT military with DT purpose of projecting strength , not aggression . As a candidate , NNP frequently questioned whether NATO and other allies were pulling their weight . On Tuesday , he VBD he wanted to strengthen " old friendships " and seek JJ ones . text: Use of color - coded bandannas in DT gay and BDSM communities DT handkerchief code ( RB known as DT hanky code , DT bandana code , and flagging [ 1 ] ) is a color - coded system , employed usually among DT gay male casual - sex seekers or BDSM practitioners in DT NNP NNPS , Canada , Australia and Europe , to indicate preferred sexual fetishes , what kind of sex PRP are seeking , and whether PRP are a top / dominant or bottom / submissive . Wearing a handkerchief on DT left side of DT body typically indicates PRP is a " top " ( CD considered active in DT practice of DT act / fetish indicated by DT color of DT handkerchief ) , while wearing PRP on DT right side of DT body MD indicate CD is a " bottom " ( CD considered passive in DT practice of DT act / fetish indicated by DT color of DT handkerchief ) . DT hanky code was widely used in DT 1970s by gay and bisexual men . DT wearing of various colored bandanas around DT neck was common in DT mid- and late - nineteenth century among cowboys , steam railroad engineers , and miners in DT Western NNP NNPS . PRP is thought IN DT wearing of bandanas by gay men originated in San Francisco after DT Gold Rush , when , because of a shortage of women , men dancing with each other in square dances developed a code wherein DT man wearing DT blue bandana took DT male part in DT square dance , and DT man wearing DT red bandana took DT female part ( these bandanas were usually worn around DT arm or hanging from DT belt or in DT back pocket of PRP 's jeans ) . [ 2 ] PRP is thought IN DT modern hanky code started in NNP York City in late 1970 or early 1971 when a journalist for DT Village Voice joked IN instead of simply wearing keys to indicate whether someone was a " top " or a " bottom " , PRP MD be more efficient to subtly announce their particular sexual focus by wearing different colored hankies . [ 3 ] Other sources attribute DT expansion of DT original red–blue system into today 's code to marketing efforts around 1971 by DT San Francisco department store for erotic merchandise , DT Trading Post , promoting handkerchiefs by printing cards listing DT meanings of various colors . [ 4 ] Alan Selby , founder of Mr. S Leather in San Francisco , claimed IN he created DT first hanky code with his business partners at Leather ' n ' Things in 1972 , when their bandana supplier inadvertently doubled their order and DT expanded code MD help them sell DT extra colors PRP had received . [ 5 ] Bob Damron 's Address Book is RB notable when referencing DT Handkerchief Code . Starting in 1964 , a businessman by DT name of Bob Damron published a book of all DT gay bars he knew from his constant travels across DT NNP NNPS . “ This book fit comfortably in DT palm of your hand , ” a description reads . “ Despite its petite size , this book was an impressive accomplishment . Each CD of DT listings he had visited himself . Every last copy of DT book he sold himself . ” [ 2 ] Bob Damron 's Address Book RB published a yearly chart for DT meaning of each colored hanky under DT title " COLOR CODES " . [ 2 ] This table is drawn from Larry Townsend 's DT Leatherman 's Handbook II ( DT 1983 second edition ; DT 1972 first edition did not include this list ) and is generally considered authoritative . Implicit in this list is DT concept of left / right polarity , left as usual indicating DT top , dominant , or active partner ; right DT bottom , submissive , or passive partner . Negotiation with a prospective partner remains important because , as Townsend noted , NNS MD wear hankies of any color " only because DT idea of DT hankie turns them on " or " MD not even VB what PRP means " . [ 6 ] DT longer lists found on DT web are more elaborate and DT JJ color codes in them are less often used in practice , although some of these colors are offered for sale at LGBT stores along with free cards listing their meanings . While DT hankie code was a semiotic system of sexual advertising popular among DT gay leather community of DT NNP NNPS [ 7 ] , PRP is no longer as popular in DT modern day era . PRP MD be seen as something kinkier to use in gay pornography , or at sex and fetish events IN DT Folsom Street Fair . Social networks MD have replaced DT use of hankies in cruising areas by digitizing DT process . By using online platforms , men who have sex with men ( MSM ) can eliminate harassment and violence WDT PRP MD face in NN . [ 8 ] Social networks for MSM RB allow for sub - groups , and for NNS to list fetishes , and what PRP are looking for , which is where DT replacement of DT need for hankies MD have come from . [ 8 ] Grindr is DT most popular app for MSM who use social networks for cruising , with an average of 1.3 hours per day spent on DT app per user . [ 9 ] • None Jacques , Trevor H. ( 1993 ) .
