text: DT NNP York Times Makes Another Attempt to Normalize Pedophilia PRP should begin with DT 2014 opinion piece published by DT NYT WDT , shockingly , few are familiar with . DT article is entitled , “ Pedophilia : A Disorder , Not a Crime . ” PRP begins , “ VB back to your first childhood crush . Maybe PRP was a classmate or a friend next door .. ” doing their best to associate this sickening practice with our first feelings of love , otherwise implying IN PRP is natural , if not normal . In what can only be seen as shameless pandering to those behind DT scenes , DT article goes on from RB to make DT assertion IN pedophiles are neither responsible for DT crimes PRP commit , nor do PRP have DT ability to stop themselves , effectively relieving these damaged individuals of all culpability and accountability for their actions . DT author goes as far as to label DT crime a “ disability , ” with potential discrimination thereof . DT writer makes DT claim IN DT laws currently in place in DT NNP are , “ inconsistent and irrational , ” and argues IN these child molesters should be sent for treatment , as opposed to serving prison NN for their heinous acts against DT most defenseless of PRP all . This is despite DT overwhelming numbers WDT show just how often these “ victims of impulse , ” as DT writer is trying to frame them , are “ victims ” of recidivism ; DT tendency of a convicted criminal to re-offend . According to Harvard NNP School , estimates of recidivism among sexual offenders vary because studies define this term in different ways . CD such Harvard review found recidivism rates as high as 50 % among pedophiles . PRP MD be thinking , this is exactly why these troubled individuals need treatment , as DT author suggests . No NN can argue IN CD with such sickening desires does not need treatment , as DT seems to be a foregone conclusion . However , DT issue in question is whether or not IN treatment actually works , and most importantly , whether or not treatment can be , or should be , used in place of a correctional facility , as DT author dangerously advocates . A 2004 NN published in DT International Journal of Offender Therapy and Comparative Criminology , which included 109 convicted sex offenders who completed therapy and 37 who dropped out , showed IN DT “ non-completers , ” were in fact more likely to commit another sexual crime . DT point being , DT treatment does work to a certain degree and is important , as JJ can attest to , but not in place of a correctional facility when considering violent sexual criminals — and for CD very clear reason . Researchers of DT NN noted IN sex offenders who completed DT therapy were not any more likely to show empathy toward their past victims . This , in DT opinion of some , shows a willingness to complete DT therapy so as to move past PRP , but not with DT intention to VB better . DT lack of empathy is a very important note , as DT researchers documented , as PRP shows a lack of remorse . How can PRP feel IN treatment for such a horrendous crime is effective if DT perpetrator never shows any remorse for DT acts PRP committed ? DT running theme throughout DT article is IN those who engage in pedophilia , should not be treated as criminals , but as victims themselves , despite DT fact IN potentially half of them will victimize another child in DT near future , and even those who complete DT treatment were no more likely so show remorse for those PRP abused . PRP MD come to all kinds of conclusions about why this article was written , and what DT intentions truly were , but at DT end of DT day , PRP MD be chalked up to any number of agendas or personal experiences , on its own . DT next aspect to consider , was DT abysmally bad coverage by DT NNP York Times , of all DT surrounding events and criminal acts in regard to DT investigation WDT became known as “ Pizzagate . ” Now to be clear , PRP must do away with visions of Hillary NNP in a pizza parlor basement with kids chained to DT walls . As I do not doubt IN these sinister individuals MD do , or have done just DT , in DT case of this investigation , those bullet points are being used to discredit and distract from DT larger truth behind DT scenes , and were likely thrown out when researchers began to VB a bit too close , as with DT case of Laura Silsby . On numerous occasions while “ covering ” DT Pizzagate investigation , DT NNP York Times editorial staff took PRP upon themselves to ignore their charge as journalists to hold those in power accountable , and instead chose to completely omit DT evidence at hand , in order to pander to DT very individuals under scrutiny for pedophilia . And DT few articles DT failing organization did choose to put out on DT topic were shockingly devoid of any critical analysis of DT information , while inserting their own feelingsabout DT case , and “ NN theorists ” as a whole . DT is not journalism , its propaganda . EX is far too much information surrounding this case to rehash PRP all in a single article ( for those interested , TLAV has done extensive research into DT case , as have JJ others such as Titus Frost ) , yet PRP is not hard to see , even with a cursory glance , IN EX is truth to these claims backed up by some pretty damning evidence , as JJ are beginning to see . Which brings PRP to a recent NYT piece entitled , “ Why I Admire Anthony Weiner ; ” and yes , PRP was written after Weiner was arrested and sentenced to prison for acts of pedophilia . This NN speaks for itself . And EX is no hidden meaning , no metaphor to be had — as if DT MD make PRP any better , should DT writer have some grand conclusion and explanation for why she is openly admiring a convicted pedophile . DT writer is simply making DT case for why she admires his conduct during his trial , for which he was being held accountable , and rightly so , for his illegal actions with a 15 - NN - old girl . In essence , DT author is saying IN Weiner chose to take DT high road , in accepting IN he was responsible for his crime instead of blaming DT NN , as JJ often do . Yet this is a blatant attempt to minimize DT negative press of both Weiner and DT Democratic party . Despite him no longer holding a position , PRP still reflects very badly on DT party , which is why PRP went to their knee - jerk political propaganda arm , DT NNP York Times , to pump out a fluff piece . In astonishingly oblivious fashion , DT writer ignores DT NNS of lies and manipulation WDT preceded Weiner ’s display of what can only be seen as regret for being caught , as opposed to actual remorse . How can PRP be admirable to sexually abuse an underage girl , lie about PRP for NNS , allow Hillary NNP to cover PRP up for PRP , wait until PRP have PRP dead to rights , still deny DT charges , then sobbingly admit to them in court when confronted with DT overwhelming evidence ? DT ’s easy , PRP ’s not . What PRP are witnessing here is what amounts to DT acceptance and normalization of child abuse by DT NNP York Times , in order to cover for some much larger issue at play . God only knows what those are … ( well , and DT independent NN ) Ryan Cristian is DT author of website , DT Last American Vagabond . text: Steve Huffman , DT chief executive of Reddit , knows he has some explaining to do . Huffman , RB a Reddit co-founder , landed in hot NN Wednesday after admitting IN he used his administrative powers to secretly edit user comments WDT were critical of him on r/ Donald - a popular , pro-Trump forum ( or " subreddit " ) . He swapped all mentions of his own username with DT names of DT pro-Trump group 's leaders , meaning IN expletive - laden posts aimed at him looked instead as if PRP were insulting DT group 's leaders . PRP was not a good idea , he told DT Post Friday by phone . " I abused my power to give DT bullies a hard NN , " he VBD . Huffman thought of his name - swapping as a joke : a way to poke back at DT NNS who 've been harassing him and some of DT site 's volunteer moderators for months . PRP was not taken DT way . Huffman 's admission fanned DT flames of controversy WDT had been surrounding DT subreddit - and its relationship with Reddit - for months . PRP RB capped off what had already been a long week . Reddit was already warring with self - proclaimed NNP supporters after shutting down a subreddit devoted to " pizzagate " -- DT claim IN EX is secret child sex - trafficking ring run by prominent Democrats . DT NNP York Times and others have debunked this theory . DT company deleted DT group for revealing NNS 's personal information . DT subreddit and its users are known for promoting NN theories and fake NN across Reddit , and gleefully invading and bombarding DT rest of DT platform with pro-Trump memes . In fact , PRP was so effective at flooding DT site 's front page with aggressive memes and posts WDT Reddit changed its algorithm over DT summer to try to limit its reach . Nearly all of DT abuse directed at Huffman , he VBD , came from avid posters to r/The . After Huffman 's admission , JJ in DT pro-Trump group demanded his resignation ; he has not addressed those calls . Huffman told DT Post IN he had been letting DT abuse from DT subreddit 's users roll off him , but then wondered if turning DT other cheek was setting a bad example . " If Donald had done this to another Reddit employee , I MD have banned them , " he VBD . He VBD he intended to swap DT names for just a few hours - despite DT fact IN doing so violates Reddit employee policies - just to give DT subreddit 's moderators a taste of what he goes through on a daily basis . Then , he VBD , he intended to put everything back . Still , DT decision to step in and directly edit user comments was a surprising move from Huffman , who has often VBN Reddit 's purpose is to provide a place for communities of all stripes to set up their own groups . Reddit has struggled to address communities who regularly test DT boundaries of its guidelines , or outright break them . In 2015 , PRP introduced JJ anti-harassment rules and banned a handful of subreddits WDT regularly violated DT site 's guidelines - including two forums dedicated to " fat - shaming , " and CD WDT existed to coordinate harassment of members of a progressive gaming site . DT bans sparked an all - out war between DT company and DT small but dedicated extreme subreddits - some of which had used Reddit to circulate stolen photos , among other things . Reddit 's former interim CEO , Ellen Pao , resigned in DT middle of DT war last NN ; Huffman succeeded her . And since he took over , Huffman has maintained IN Reddit will not interfere with users ' posts , as long as PRP stayed within DT basic guidelines . To take a step across DT line , especially for a joke , is a major departure from DT philosophy . " What he did completely destroys DT credibility of Reddit , " wrote UnimatrixZeroOne , a Reddit moderator who " out of anger " released screen shots of Slack conversations Thursday between Reddit moderators , admins and Huffman about DT altered posts . Huffman confirmed on Friday IN DT images were authentic . In those conversations , some of DT site 's other moderators expressed frustration with DT pro-Trump subreddit and asked Huffman to ban PRP for repeatedly violating guidelines . CD wrote IN DT group 's members had released personally identifying information about others during DT election season . DT person RB mentioned receiving specific threats : " Car vandalism , pipe bomb threat ( specific ) . Rallying calls to ruin my personal life , " DT moderator wrote . Huffman 's distaste for DT group is clear , but DT chats showed he does not agree with banning PRP outright . " PRP make PRP seem IN I do n't care about figuring out t , " Huffman wrote later in DT chat , VBG on to say IN " banning PRP , " as JJ of DT moderators had asked , " MD create a mess . " ( DT moderators regularly abbreviate " Donald " to " t " or " td . " ) " PRP managed to pull a move WDT actually unified PRP with them against this mistake , " CD moderator replied . Even Reddit users WDT do n't support NNP have criticized Huffman . " I ca n't stand DT thought of NNP entering DT White House , but I have to stand up to this , " VBD CD commenter on DT site . " PRP 's wrong and totally unprofessional . PRP 's VBG to zap any trust NNS have with DT organization . " Huffman VBD he knows what he did MD set a bad precedent WDT MD hurt users ' trust in DT site . But he RB VBD , having seen this torrent of abuse first hand , IN he will have Reddit step up its efforts to let users filter out negative content , and to take on DT general problem of harassment . He did n't offer a timeline for those steps . But , he promised , PRP will have more finesse than his ill - received attempt at a joke . " I had my fun with them , PRP had their fun with me , " he VBD . " But PRP are not VBG to tolerate harassment for any others . "

text: EX is a shared concern for these monographs . Both books are concerned with how DT nature of groups , taken together with our evolved psychology , can explain informational dynamics . Their central explanatory targets are DT spread and persistence of falsities , DT success or failure of charismatic demagogues , and DT baffling attractiveness of turgid academic prose . Yet DT JJ examples WDT Acerbi and Mercier focus on — do I share this post ? Spread DT rumor ? Believe those doomsayers ?— tend to have low costs and consequences . DT category of reflective beliefs , in fact , can be read as a mechanism for explaining why beliefs with seemingly high costs ( being a ‘ 911 truther ’ , say ) nonetheless do not have DT costs PRP are purported to have ( IN refusing all engagement with a presumed to be corrupt NN ) . Reflective beliefs just are n’t acted upon . EX is CD possible exception . Mercier discusses a kind of action he calls ‘ bridge - burning ’ . These involve making statements WDT are unacceptable and offensive to a group . PRP might VB then , IN these are high - cost actions . And in CD sense PRP are : PRP reduce or eliminate opportunities for collaboration , communication , and exchange with DT aggrieved party . But in another sense PRP are not . These ‘ bridge - burning ’ exercises are , on Mercier ’s framework , a means of ingratiating oneself to a different , friendlier group — PRP increase PRP ’s credibility with this JJ group precisely because PRP has nowhere else to turn . And this is why Mercier thinks PRP have mechanisms for assessing DT receptivity of our claims : PRP need to VB whether PRP ’ll find a welcome party when all routes out are ashes . ‘ Bridge - burning ’ can be a high - risk strategy . But EX are plenty of situations WDT are high - risk , high - cost , and made under conditions of uncertainty — do I invest in this method or DT CD ? Do I signal my affiliation to those guys or these ones ? When do I join in ? Such high - stakes social and JJ situations occur in JJ situations where informational dynamics , judgement aggregation , and group dynamics come together in highly context - sensitive ways . Acerbi ’s book is sensitive to these issues , and introduces some tools for measuring DT organization of social networks , DT strength of connections , and DT availability of information . For instance , Acerbi notes IN JJ social NN platforms tend to have networks with a ‘ hub - JJ ’ or ‘ star - JJ ’ network structure , where multiple individuals link to a central node . Take Donald NNP ’s twitter account , which has over seventy million followers yet only follows forty - some other accounts . His twitter network is very ‘ star - JJ ’ , with accounts connecting to his UH so JJ points radiating out of a central star . Interestingly , however , informational dynamics on these star - JJ networks can create illusions , giving “ DT misleading impression of polarization on Twitter , while , in fact , DT great majority of accounts [ are ] not or [ are ] scarcely polarized . ” ( CEDA 110 ) This is what Lerman et al. ( 2016 ) have called a ‘ majority illusion ’ ; IN despite being a minority , a population can appear to be in DT majority because of DT structural features of social networks . Footnote 7 PRP matters if PRP perceives PRP ’s self to be in DT minority . Centola et al. ( 2005 ) , for instance , have argued IN such a perception can drive DT expansion of otherwise unpopular norms . Networks WDT facilitate ‘ majority illusions ’ might thus exacerbate such spreading . Likewise , NNP ’s informational reach matters . Maybe multiple agents VBP together to discuss DT American Revolutionary War . PRP might talk about how revolutionary soldiers ‘ took over DT British airports ’ , recalling IN PRP heard this information from somewhere . Given IN multiple independent agents recall DT information , this might lend additional credence to DT claims . But DT seeming independence is false and driven by network effects : all had heard PRP from a common source , NNP ’s Fourth of July “ Salute to America . ” Footnote 8 Lest this seem IN a facile example , Mercier deploys something IN this mechanism to explain DT start of DT Iraq War and DT spread of religions ( NBY , 172–176 ) . Yet while issues around network topology creep in here - and - RB in Acerbi and Mercier ’s books , neither gives what I VBP to be sufficient attention . EX is now a large and powerful body of work on DT effects of social network topologies on information dynamics coming out of social epistemology , economics , and other literatures . DT analytic and agent - based models of these literatures show how network organization interacting with information aggregation procedures can generate surprising individual - and group - level effects . I VBP EX are plenty of reasons why both Acerbi and Mercier should VB to pay more attention this expansive literature . DT first is IN PRP provides a suite of tools , metrics , and explanatory models for understanding DT trade - offs and consequences of different network topologies , information aggregation strategies , and group compositions . These directly address DT social phenomena WDT Acerbi and Mercier target , offering a distinct perspective on DT information dynamics of innovation diffusion ( e.g. Kiesling et al. 2012 ) , testimonial norms ( e.g. Mayo - Wilson 2014 ) , and conformity effects ( e.g. Mohseni and Williams 2019 ) . DT second reason concerns DT role of background information and context in both Acerbi and Mercier ’s books . Incoming information is tested against background information for plausibility , and shapes DT trajectories of cultural NN . But this suggests IN information dynamics will be highly sensitive to DT order in which information is received — our priors can be biased and our evaluation non-commutative . This matters substantially for information dynamics , offering routes for systematic group - level disagreement ( Zollman 2010 ) , polarization ( Goldberg and Stein 2018 ) , and deviation from optimal or more veridical outcomes ( Holman and Bruner 2017 ) . And third , social network models provide contrasts to DT assumptions at work in Acerbi and Mercier . Both suggest , in more or less DT same form , IN DT “ spread of most misconceptions is explained by their intuitively appealing content , rather than by DT skills of those who propound them . ” ( NBY 260 ) This is a bold claim , especially given IN modelling results from social networks suggest IN under quite minimal assumptions , wholly rational agents can end up pursuing and perpetuating false beliefs ( O’Connor and Weatherall 2019 ) . These effects can be exacerbated by malicious actors ( ibid. ) , but can RB be produced where informational uncertainty combines with specific network topologies ( O’Connor and Weatherall 2020 ) . This is what I meant when I VBD above IN DT gullibility account is a useful foil , but IN ultimately Mercier is punching - down . Mercier associates DT gullibility account with a deferential attitude towards authority and an unquestioning acceptance of all information ; IN human beings are mindless sheeple subject to herd behavior . But DT picture endorsed by Mercier and Acerbi — with rational agents operating under uncertainty — can still generate herd - JJ behavior ( Banerjee 1992 ; Hung and Plott 2001 ) , conformity and free - riding ( List and Pettit 2004 ) , and DT persistence of misinformed groups ( Golub and Jackson 2010 ) under a wide range of plausible conditions . So I VBP EX are good reasons why Acerbi and Mercier should engage with these nearby literatures . But EX is no reason why DT engagement should be a CD - way street . JJ of DT models employed in social epistemology and economics employ sparse characterizations of human agents and their psychology . Mercier and Acerbi ’s work , by contrast , draws on experimental results from psychology , paleoanthropological evidence , and evolutionary reasoning to back substantive claims about human cognition . Feeding these psychological and evolutionary assumptions into network models might offer a means of exploring their claims about human cognitive evolution , cultural NN , and DT spread of misinformation . At DT same NN , such an exchange might generate useful helpful friction . Current network models often share a basic assumption with Acerbi and Mercier — notably , some form of rationality . PRP might VB , then , IN these models are grist to DT authors ’ evolutionary mills . But PRP might not . For JJ network models are minimal models ( Weisberg 2013 ) , WDT show how significant group level effects can be driven by few psychological assumptions . These suggest IN while DT mechanisms endorsed in Acerbi and Mercier ’s books MD be sufficient to generate DT relevant phenomena , PRP are not necessary . EX are other empirically - supported characterizations of how human beings acquire , interpret , and transmit information . How these two characterizations should be reconciled is an open question . But looking at DT rich theoretical and modelling literature in economics , social epistemology and sociology provides not only a strong juxtaposition to DT two accounts on offer , but RB a rich set of tools for exploring their hypotheses and claims . However this interaction plays out , PRP is worth closing on a positive note . Both Mercier and Acerbi ’s volumes are enjoyable , story - driven journeys . PRP guide DT reader through large and expanding literatures in an entertaining and illuminating way . PRP are upbeat about human capabilities and provide a useful optimistic counterpoint to DT recent spate of epistemological doomsayers .
